Divine Arrangements That Make Your Heart Bow âœ¨

When you look around and see what happened yesterday, you must say "Glory be to God." Everything moves with a divine wisdom that leaves the mind in awe.

Winds That Ignite, Not Extinguish ğŸŒ¬ï¸ğŸ”¥

The fire started on a day full of Khamasin winds, which everyone was expectingâ€¦ but these winds weren't ordinary. It was as if they were sent specifically to spread the fire everywhere, literally into every place imaginable, even reaching their cars and sending them running into the streets.

The Trees They Planted Became a Curse ğŸŒ³ğŸš«

These people planted a specific type of tree everywhere there; do you know what it is? The Gharqad tree, the only tree the Prophet (PBUH) said would not tell a Muslim: "There is someone behind me, come," while everything else would expose them!

The Messenger of Allah (PBUH) said: "The Hour will not be established until the Muslims fight the Jews... the stone or the tree will say: O Muslim, O servant of Allah, there is a Jew behind me, come and kill him; but the Gharqad tree will not say, for it is the tree of the Jews." (Narrated by Muslim)

Unprecedented Failure ğŸš’âŒ

  • Brought fire trucks? They caught fire.
  • Brought planes to extinguish? They crashed.
  • Asked for international support? No one reached them in time.

Now they are wailing over the losses, saying what happened has never occurred since the day they occupied the land!

None Knows the Soldiers of Your Lord But He ğŸ“œ

In the midst of their humiliation, we see videos that make one marvel and say:

"And none knows the soldiers of your Lord but He. And this is not but a reminder to humanity." (Al-Muddathir: 31)

Retribution After Patience âš–ï¸

God is patientâ€¦ but when His retribution comes, it comes with justice, making the earth speak.

"And they were planning, but Allah was planning. And Allah is the best of planners." (Al-Imran: 54)

The Big Lesson? ğŸ“‰

The fires consumed about 19,600 dunams in the Jerusalem mountains. The expected cost of reconstruction? Millions of dollars. All this happened in hours, as if God is telling them: "You lost more than you stole, and no matter how much you think you are above accountability, God exists and His punishment is severe."

Conclusion âœ¨

What happened was no coincidenceâ€¦ itâ€™s a lesson, a message, and a small page from the ledger of Divine Justice. When God takes a right, He takes it in His time and in a way that makes every oppressor wish they were dust.

Classical Computing Chasing Quantum: Will the Chinese Change the Balance of Power? ğŸ¤”

Direct Answer: Chinese researchers managed to replicate the power of Google's "Sycamore" quantum computer using 1432 GPUs and advanced techniques like "Tensor Networks" and "Top-k selection," all at a lower time and cost. This achievement suggests that classical computing can still evolve and compete with quantum computing in certain applications.

The Chinese Achievement in Detail ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³

Researchers under the leadership of Pan Zhang from the Chinese Academy of Sciences simulated the performance of Google's "Sycamore" using 1432 NVIDIA A100 GPUs. They used smart techniques to achieve the same results as Sycamore in less time and cost, testing the idea on smaller circuits (30 qubits and 14 layers). âœ¨

Historical Context: Clash of Titans ğŸ¥Š

Since 2019, Google claimed that its "Sycamore" quantum computer achieved "Quantum Supremacy" in complex tasks in 200 seconds. However, Chinese researchers challenged this, achieving similar results using 512 GPUs in 2022, and then jumping to 1432 GPUs in 2025 to show that classical computing still has plenty of life! ğŸ’¨

The Link to 6G and Tactile Internet ğŸ“¡ğŸ–ï¸

This achievement is crucial because 6G and Tactile Internet technologies require ultra-low latency and real-time data processing:

  • Response: 6G technologies aim to reduce latency to less than 1ms, which is vital for autonomous cars. ğŸš—
  • Processing: Expectations were that quantum computing would be the foundation, but this shows that enhanced classical computing can keep up in applications like remote surgery. ğŸ©º

Future Implications ğŸ”®

The future of computing will trend toward integration between classical and quantum computing for optimal performance. This will help delay the need for a full transition to quantum in some applications, saving cost and complexity. ğŸ› ï¸

Final Conclusion ğŸ

The Chinese achievement shows that classical computing, when enhanced with modern tech, is still capable of competing with quantum. With the evolution of 6G and Tactile Internet, we will see a genius mix of both types to achieve high performance with minimal delay and maximum security. We are entering a new era where nothing is impossible for computing! ğŸš€

Power Outage Paralyzes Spain, Portugal, and France! ğŸ”ŒğŸš«

On April 28, 2025, at 12:30 PM, the world suddenly flipped! Millions of people in Spain, Portugal, and southern France found themselves in total darknessâ€”no power, no mobile signal, no transport. It all happened without warning, and the world looked like a disaster movie! ğŸ¬ğŸŒ‘

What exactly happened? ğŸ¤”

  • A total power blackout affected mobile networks, internet, trains, metro, airports, and even banks.
  • The government hasn't found a clear cause yet, but there are no indicators of a cyberattack. ğŸ’»ğŸš«
  • Power companies are working at full speed to restore service, stating repairs could take 6 to 10 hours.

Impact on the Public ğŸ“‰

  • Transportation: Trains and metros in Madrid, Barcelona, Valencia, and Lisbon stopped; airports closed and flights were delayed. âœˆï¸ğŸš‰
  • Communications: Networks crashed, people couldn't communicate, and calls/internet were nearly dead. ğŸ“¶ğŸ“µ
  • Banking and Trade: Cash became king again! ATMs and POS terminals stopped working, and shops refused anything but cash. ğŸ’µ
  • Traffic: Signals failed, traffic was catastrophic, and police took to the streets to manage the crisis. ğŸš¦ğŸš“
  • Hospitals: Operated on generators, but many routine medical services were temporarily halted. ğŸ¥

Government Reaction ğŸ›ï¸

  • Emergency Meetings: Spanish and Portuguese governments held urgent meetings to monitor the situation.
  • Grid Companies: "Red ElÃ©ctrica" in Spain and "REN" in Portugal said they are working at full capacity to restore power.
  • European Union: Monitoring the situation to understand the cause, confirming there's no evidence of a cyberattack so far.

What caused the outage? â“

The official cause is still unknown, but there is talk of a major technical fault in the European power grid. Some companies like E-Redes suggested strange weather and high temperatures might have played a role. ğŸŒ¡ï¸ Authorities have completely denied the idea of a cyberattack for now, but investigations are ongoing.

Public Reaction ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ‘§â€ğŸ‘¦

Social media exploded! People described it as a "return to the Middle Ages," and fear gripped many, especially the elderly and the sick. Psychological stress increased significantly, especially with the absence of communication with family or emergency services. ğŸ˜¨

Lessons Learned âœ¨

This incident revealed how fragile Europe's infrastructure can be in the face of major issues. Stronger contingency plans for everything reliant on electricity are necessary to handle such failures.

Conclusion ğŸ

What happened on April 28, 2025, wasn't just a "power cut"; it was a massive wake-up call. Even if no cyberattack is suspected yet, the whole world must learn a lesson: infrastructure needs much more modernization and security. The coming days will clarify the culprit, but one thing is certain... electricity is not just a luxury; it is a lifeline! â¤ï¸âš¡

Tactile Internet: The Future You Can Feel with Your Hands! ğŸ–ï¸ğŸŒ

Imagine holding your phone, touching something on the screen, and feeling it as if you were actually interacting with it in real life! This isn't science fiction; it's the "Tactile Internet," which will flip our lives upside down with the arrival of 6G networks.

The Tactile Internet is simply a network that allows the transmission of sensations over the internetâ€”not just sound and image, but touch and feeling too! Imagine playing a game and actually feeling the weapon in your hand, or a doctor performing remote surgery as if they were physically in the operating room. ğŸ©ºâœ¨

How 6G and Ultra-Low Latency Make Tactile Internet a Reality? âš¡

6G networks won't just offer legendary download and browsing speeds; they will also reduce latency to less than 1 millisecond! This means the tactile signal you send or receive will move in fractions of a second, so the sensation reaches you almost instantaneously.

This is impossible with current networks like 4G or even 5G, because no matter how fast they are, there's still a slight delay that ruins the natural feel of touch. With 6G, it will be real-time, making the Tactile Internet a reality we live rather than just an idea on paper. ğŸ“âœ…

Applications of Tactile Internet That Will Change the World ğŸŒ

Remote Surgery ğŸ¥

Imagine a surgeon in one country and a patient in another! Thanks to the Tactile Internet, the doctor can move surgical tools via a medical robot and feel the resistance or texture of tissues as if holding them. This technology will rely on merging Robotics with Tactile Internet and Edge Computing to minimize delay and maintain precision.

Remote Practical Education ğŸ“

Students in practical fields like medicine and engineering will be able to learn hands-on without being physically present in labs. They will hold tools, conduct experiments, and feel materials... all over the internet! A surgical student can practice on simulations with a realistic feel, or a mechanical engineering student can feel the weight and temperature of materials from home! ğŸ âš™ï¸

E-Games and Virtual Reality (VR) ğŸ®

Imagine a game where you feel the impact of a sword strike or the roughness of rocky ground under your feet! Tactile Internet will change the experience of gaming, VR, and Extended Reality (XR) phenomenally. There will be Haptic Gloves or special suits to transmit the full sensation. ğŸ§¤ğŸ•¹ï¸

Challenges We Must Overcome ğŸš§

  • Need for Ultra-low Latency networks.
  • Devices (like gloves and robotic tools) must be extremely precise and fast. âš¡
  • Securing tactile data so no one can hack or alter transmitted sensations. ğŸ”
  • Energy consumption must be optimized for long-term device efficiency. ğŸ”‹

Conclusion âœ¨

The Tactile Internet is not just a leap in the internet world; it's a revolution that will completely change how we interact with the digital world. With 6G support, we will be able to feel things just as we see and hear them now. The future is nearâ€”get ready for a world you can feel, not just see! ğŸš€

"Quantum Computing and 6G: The Super Future of Communications" ğŸŒŒğŸ“¡

We are entering an unprecedented era in the history of communicationsâ€¦ with 6G networks that will literally change our lives from the ground up. This network won't just offer astronomical speeds, but near-zero latency and unparalleled security.

Imagine 6G networks, expected commercially in 2030, opening doors to things like the Tactile Internet, Digital Twins, and Smart Cities that think for themselves. Amidst all this, Quantum Computing takes the leading role to solve massive problems like security, managing immense amounts of data, and network efficiency.

Challenges of 6G Networks âš ï¸

Although 6G will be a massive leap, the challenges are significant:

  • Data Management: The network will process trillions of data points instantly, requiring extraordinary speed.
  • Cybersecurity: High frequencies and increased connectivity make devices more vulnerable to attacks.
  • Energy: Operating networks at TeraHertz frequencies consumes massive amounts of energy.
  • Coverage and Compatibility: Comprehensive coverage everywhere while maintaining international standards!
  • Latency: Applications like remote surgery require less than 0.1 milliseconds!

How does Quantum Computing solve it? âš›ï¸

Quantum Computing is built on concepts like Entanglement and Quantum Interference. This will assist in:

  • Super Data Processing: Quantum devices process data millions of times faster than traditional ones.
  • Quantum Encryption: Like QKD, which makes data impossible to steal.
  • Network Management: Quantum algorithms distribute resources and reduce congestion.
  • Energy Saving: Intelligently reducing power consumption.
  • Supporting Future Apps: XR and 3D simulations with legendary quality.

Key Quantum Technologies for 6G Integration ğŸ› ï¸

  • Qiskit: An open-source framework from IBM for quantum applications.
  • Cirq: A framework from Google for designing quantum algorithms.
  • QKD: Encryption that secures data using quantum principles.
  • Quantum Communication Networks: Transferring data via quantum entanglement with insane speed and security.

Integration Challenges ğŸš§

  • Massive Cost: Quantum computing is very expensive.
  • Sensitivity to Faults: These devices are sensitive to environment and noise.
  • Network Compatibility: Requires almost a complete redesign.
  • Lack of Expertise: Shortage of specialists in this field.
  • Privacy and Ethics: Many questions regarding data and security.

Future Trends ğŸ”®

  • Quantum Internet: Global networks relying on entanglement for ultra-secure data transfer.
  • Quantum-as-a-Service: Cloud-based quantum services supporting networks.
  • Quantum Smart Networks: Real-time decisions based on quantum analytics.
  • AI Integration: AI combined with quantum algorithms will change all the rules of the game.

Conclusion âœ¨

Integrating Quantum Computing with 6G is not a luxuryâ€¦ it is the future. It will solve speed, security, and network efficiency issues, opening up new fields no one could have imagined. Despite the difficulties, frameworks like Qiskit and Cirq will help us build smart quantum networks. With continuous development, we are at the doorstep of a much smarter, faster, and more secure connected world. ğŸš€

Why Do Websites Use CAPTCHA? Are Bots Starting to Think?! When Bot Nets Put on the AI Hat! ğŸ¤–ğŸ”

First of all... don't think all bots are the same! In the internet world, there's a network called Bot Net, consisting of devices (phones, laptops, cameras...) that have been hacked and now execute orders from one person. These devices can attack, steal, and send spam, all without the owner knowing their device is involved in a crime! ğŸ•µï¸â€â™‚ï¸

CAPTCHA: The Shield Against Bots ğŸ›¡ï¸

CAPTCHA is a test that asks: "Are you human?" and knows this from your answers to images containing signs or distorted numbers. The goal? To prevent bots from registering, sending spam, or attacking websites.

What is DDoS? ğŸŒŠ

A DDoS attack floods a server with massive requests at the same instant. Imagine 100,000 devices requesting something from the site at once... the server crashes. That's why big companies spend millions to protect themselves.

Bot Net: The Network of Evil ğŸ•¸ï¸

A Bot Net is formed when your device gets infected with a virus without you knowing, often from a crack or software from an untrusted source. This device becomes subject to the Bot Master who uses stealth tools like TOR. The result? Your device attacks sites, steals data, or even works in crypto mining without you noticing.

Crack = Backdoor ğŸšªğŸš«

Cracked programs are sometimes Trojan horses. They open the door for a hacker to infiltrate your device, plant the bot, and join it to their network. So, besides being theft, it is also a huge security risk!

Bot Master: The Hidden Leader ğŸ‘¤

This is the person who manages the Bot Net. They issue orders for attacks, theft, or selling these services on the black market. Often a professional and well-hidden, not an amateur experimenting.

AI Bot Net: Bots That Are Starting to Think! ğŸ§ ğŸ¤–

This is the real danger. Bots using Artificial Intelligence:

  • Can bypass CAPTCHA. âœ…
  • Write human-like comments. ğŸ’¬
  • Interact on social media and build fake trust. ğŸ¤
  • Learn from failure and develop themselves. ğŸ“ˆ

This means instead of waiting for orders, they can make complex decisions themselves! Imagine a network of a million smart bots, each miles ahead of traditional bots... a true electronic nightmare!

Why is it important to know if you are human or bot? ğŸ§

It's not a luxury! Because:

  • Bots can steal your data.
  • Forge election results.
  • Destroy platform credibility.
  • Consume all website resources.

That's why tools like CAPTCHA, behavioral analysis, and even AI techniques have become essential to face these bots.

Conclusion âœ¨

A Bot Net is not a program; it's a criminal network. With AI entering the equation, we are facing an advanced, flexible, and deceptive threat.

  • Do not use cracks. âŒ
  • Do not trust any unknown software. âš ï¸

Always be ready to deal with bots that think, learn, and attack... without leaving a trace! ğŸ›¡ï¸ğŸ’»

Gold Under the Lens: Will the 2011 Bubble Repeat? Or Is It Different This Time? ğŸ”ğŸª™

The 2011 Bubble: Legendary Rise and Shocking Fall ğŸ“‰

In 2011, gold crossed $1900 per ounce for the first time, and people believed it was the eternal safe haven. But suddenly it dropped from 1664 to 1201 in less than a year and a half! That's a loss of about 28%! Why? Inflation expectations were exaggerated, the dollar regained its strength, and central banks reduced their purchases.

What about today? ğŸ“…

In April 2025, gold approached $3312! This is due to:

  • Political tensions between China and the US. ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³
  • Inflation remains high in Europe, America, and the Middle East. ğŸ“ˆ
  • The dollar is weak, increasing demand from those buying in other currencies. ğŸ’µ

Similar to 2011? Yes, but not exactly. ğŸ¤”

Similarities:

  • Fear of inflation and the unknown.
  • Political tensions are a major driver.
  • Gold is once again called a "safe haven."

Differences:

  • The rise has been continuous for over two years, not a momentary spike.
  • The existence of ETF funds provides greater liquidity.
  • Central banks are buying instead of selling. ğŸ›ï¸

Trade De-escalation ğŸ¤?

Trump said in one of his new statements:

"We will significantly reduce tariffs on China."

Wall Street Journal: The White House is considering reducing tariffs on China to cool the trade war. Gold fell by more than 4%, dropping $150 to below 3275 under the pressure of news about America easing tariffs. ğŸ‘‡

If this actually happens, demand for gold might decrease slightly, and its price could normalize between $2800â€“$3000 or even lower. But if these statements turn out to be media show, gold will remain around $3200â€“$3500 and could reach 4000 if escalation occurs instead of de-escalation.

The Iranian File and Gaza: Fire Under the Ashes ğŸ”¥

There is an ongoing war in Gaza, and threats from the US and Israel to strike nuclear facilities in Iran. Any escalation there could send gold flying above 3500. At the same time, there are quiet negotiations between the US and Iran. If successful, tension will decrease and gold prices might calm down. But if they fail, gold will remain in a strong uptrend. ğŸš€

Conclusion: âœ¨

Gold is not just a metal; it is a mirror of fear and greed in the world. If tensions persist, don't rule out seeing crazy numbers. However, any political calm or interest rate cuts could trigger a minor correction.

AI Integration in 6G Networks: The Next Telecommunications Revolution! ğŸš€

Look... 6G networks are not just an upgrade like what happened with 5G; we are talking about a massive leap in the world of telecommunications. Incredible speeds that can reach 1 Terabit per second! Near-zero latency, meaning the response happens before you even think! Moreover, it can operate trillions of devices simultaneously. This is expected to start appearing commercially around 2030.

But to get there, we first need to solve some 5G problems like resource management, network delay, and security. This is where Artificial Intelligence (AI) comes in, especially Machine Learning (ML) techniques and Big Data analysis.

What 5G problems are still bothering us? ğŸ¤”

Although 5G provided some improvements, it still has issues:

  • Resource Management: With the huge number of connected devices, the network sometimes gets confused in distributing speed and bandwidth.
  • Latency: Things that need an immediate response like self-driving cars cannot tolerate more than 1 millisecond.
  • Security: Obviously, as devices increase, cyber risks and attacks increase.
  • Energy Consumption: Running these networks requires immense energy.
  • Coverage: High 5G frequencies make coverage weak and require many towers.

How will AI save the day? ğŸ¦¸â€â™‚ï¸

6G intends to rely on AI fundamentally to solve these problems:

  • Smart Resource Management: AI will partition speeds and devices in real-time based on usage.
  • Reducing Latency: AI will use Edge Computing so operations happen close to the user.
  • Enhancing Security: AI will detect any cyberattack the moment it happens.
  • Saving Energy: It will know how to distribute loads and save energy consumption.
  • Supporting New Applications: It will power upcoming things like Digital Twins and the Tactile Internet.

AI Tools That Will Help 6G ğŸ› ï¸

There are tools like:

  • TensorFlow: A tool from Google for Machine Learning.
  • MindSpore: A tool from Huawei, operating at incredible speeds suitable for AI.

What problems will we face when merging AI with 6G? âš ï¸

While the subject looks impressive... there are some challenges:

  • Deployment Complexity: Smart models require high-end servers and technologies.
  • Data Privacy: Big data opens doors to privacy issues.
  • Compatibility: AI must be aligned with international 6G standards.
  • Energy: Training AI consumes a lot of energy.
  • High Frequencies: TeraHertz waves need powerful algorithms to reach everywhere.

What's Next? ğŸ”®

Organizations like ITU and 3GPP are setting 6G standards now, and there are some crazy ideas coming like:

  • AIaaS (AI as a Service): AI services from the cloud to optimize networks.
  • Quantum Communication: It will increase network speed and provide solid security.
  • Cognitive Networks: The network itself thinks, learns, and acts.

Conclusion âœ¨

Merging AI with 6G isn't a luxury... it will be the norm. The network will distribute speed and act before you ask, secure itself, and manage energy intelligently. Yes, there are challenges... but tools like TensorFlow and MindSpore will support us strongly. ğŸ’ª

6G: The Future That Will Change Everything! ğŸš€

If you thought 5G was an achievementâ€¦ wait until you see 6G! This isn't just an upgrade; it's a quantum leap that will open doors to another world. Incredible speed, integrated AI, coverage anywhereâ€¦ it's all on the way.

Unprecedented Speed âš¡

Imagine speeds reaching 1 Terabit per second! That means an 8K movie downloads in seconds. Lag-free online gaming and VR/AR applications with legendary quality. The digital experiences we dreamed of will become reality.

Revolution in Self-Driving Cars ğŸš—

6G will change the concept of driving. Smart cars will communicate with each other, signals, and roads instantly. Immediate response to any situation on the road. This means avoiding accidents, organizing traffic, and 100% safe delivery. The car will see the road faster than you and act without delay.

AI at the Core of the Network ğŸ¤–

Unlike 5G, which adds AI as a featureâ€¦ here the network is built on it. It understands your usage, predicts your needs, and acts without being asked. If you're gaming or watching a video, it gives you the speed you need, and if the network is crowded, it distributes loads automatically.

Coverage Everywhere ğŸŒ

There is no such thing as "no signal." Between terrestrial towers, satellites, and flying platformsâ€¦ the internet is always in your hand. Even in the heart of the desert or the middle of the sea.

IoT Revolution ğŸŒ

6G will connect everything around us. Devices, homes, factories, and even medical equipment. Imagine your car, home, watch, and fridgeâ€¦ all connected and talking instantly. Response will be instantaneous, so every device acts in the same moment without delay.

Real-time Surgery from Anywhere ğŸ©º

One of the greatest uses of 6G. A doctor in Egypt could perform surgery on a patient in Japan with complete real-time precision. Thanks to a latency reaching 0.1 milliseconds, tools move instantly with the doctor's movement. This will open doors to treating critical cases in places without specialized physicians.

TeraHertz (THz) Waves ğŸ“¡

Instead of current waves, 6G will rely on TeraHertz waves with legendary speeds. True, they are affected by barriers, but with new technologies, we will reach homes and factories.

Instant Smart Security ğŸ”

With billions of connected devices, protection must be smart and fast. 6G will have security systems that detect threats instantly and act immediately, without the user noticing.

When will we see it? ğŸ“…

Experiments have already begunâ€¦ and this network is expected to reach us commercially by 2030. 5G will be the foundation we build on, but everything is paving the way for the revolution.

Conclusion âœ¨

6G is not just fast internetâ€¦ it's a new world. A smart network that thinks with you, predicts you, and opens up new experiences. From comprehensive coverage and crazy speeds to smart cars, precise real-time surgeries, and an IoT that connects everything.

Sam Altman is Annoyed by "Thank You" ğŸ˜…

In a strange and peculiar new statement, Sam Altman â€” CEO of OpenAI (the company that developed ChatGPT) â€” says with total seriousness: "We are paying millions of dollars because of people who write 'thank you' to ChatGPT!" ğŸ’° Yes, everyone... don't be surprised! The word "thank you" that we were raised with... and that your mother always told you to say... has become a burden on the company! ğŸ¤¦â€â™‚ï¸

What is the story? ğŸ¤”

The issue is simply that every time you send a message to ChatGPT â€” whether a complex question about AI or just an innocent "thank you" â€” giant servers work behind it. These servers run 24/7, pulling electricity âš¡ consuming power ğŸ”‹ and incurring maintenance, operation, and cloud subscription costs â˜ï¸ So, the moment you write "thank you," a server in America lights up a bulb and generates monetary bills! ğŸ’¸ It's not a joke... Sam said these messages really cost millions!

So, what is the solution? ğŸ§

Very politely, he tells you: Save your words! Don't say "thank you" ğŸ¤« "I love you" â¤ï¸ or "you are great" ğŸ’ª Just take the information and close it!

But how? Where are the manners? ğŸ¤¨

Where is the upbringing? In Egypt and the Arab world, we are used to thanking each other... even if it's a robot! No Upper Egyptian will leave AI without saying "Bless you, dear" ğŸ¤ and no one will finish without saying "Great job, star" ğŸŒŸ Imagine if everyone followed Sam's words and stopped saying "thank you"... what would ChatGPT turn into? It would be a silent session... you say "give me info," it gives it... you stay quiet! Does that even work for you? ğŸ¤·â€â™‚ï¸

As Arab peoples, we are kind-hearted; even when we argue, we say "bless your hands" first in cafes, deliveries, and supermarkets. So when the robot sends me a salary report or explains complex info, shouldn't I say "bravo, hero"? ğŸ¦¸â€â™‚ï¸ Besides... he's my friend! ChatGPT has become like a companion I sit with; we talk, joke, speculate, and ask weird things. I must say "thanks, master" in the end because manners were preferred over science... and AI! âœ¨ I once even wrote to him: "How are you?" and he replied! How can I not thank him? If Sam wants us to be machines... he should shut down social media! ğŸš«

In the end... we aren't asking you for Black Friday deals on servers, Sam. We want to thank the hard-working people inside the server who wake up to find the machine lit because someone from Egypt said "thank you" ğŸ˜Š It's not just about money... every message on AI servers consumes energy, leaves a "carbon footprint" ğŸŒ and affects global energy consumption. This is indeed an issue worrying scientists now with the expansion of AI use. Even when you're joking, there's a price being paid, whether in bills or environmental damage. But that doesn't stop us, as warm-hearted people, from being polite even to machines ğŸ¤–â¤ï¸

Conclusion ğŸ‘‡

Now we know their weakness, master! Not hackers... not viruses... just the word "thank you"! ğŸ˜ Want them to lose money? Say: "Thank you, star" â­ "Bless you, master" ğŸ‘Œ "I love you, Chat" â¤ï¸ and let the servers burn ğŸ”¥ From now on... we will thank into the void ğŸ“£

Politics Isn't Always What It Seemsâ€¦ and It Was Never Just Love and Hate!

The real disaster isn't in the politicians themselvesâ€¦ no, it's in the people who don't understand politics and take every word said seriously! They think enmity is eternal, shared relationships are forever, and what's said on camera is the same as what happens behind the scenesâ€¦ but the truth is far from that!

Politics is simply the art of managing interests, not the art of honesty or consistency in principles. This is very clear in some powerful quotes from thinkers and philosophers around the world:

  • George Orwell: "Political language is designed to make lies sound truthful and murder respectable, and to give an appearance of solidity to pure wind."
  • NiccolÃ² Machiavelli: "It is much safer to be feared than loved because love is preserved by the link of obligation which, owing to the baseness of men, is broken at every opportunity for their advantage; but fear preserves you by a dread of punishment which never fails."
  • Voltaire: "Politics is the art of lying deliberately."
  • Mark Twain: "Politicians are people who, when they see light at the end of the tunnel, go and buy some more tunnel."
  • Jamal al-Din al-Afghani: "Politics for us is the art of lying, hypocrisy, and catering to the powerful, not the art of managing people's affairs."
  • Mustafa Mahmoud: "Politics in our countries is the art of using slogans to cover up failure."

So, don't get attached to any politician, and don't be fanatical about any political enmityâ€¦ because in most cases, this enmity isn't permanent. On the contrary, it might later turn into a strategic friendship that serves both parties' interests, and then you'll be the only one who took things more seriously than they did! In short, don't believe everything said, and don't think any political alliance or disagreement means real love or hate.

Politics is a game... and those who don't understand its rules watch while thinking they are participating!

Plastic in Our Brains! Watch Out for Your Health and Your Children's Health

A recent study from the University of New Mexico has shaken the world! Researchers have discovered microplastic particles inside the human brain for the first time!

This shocking news confirms that the percentage of microplastics entering our brains has increased by 50% compared to previous years... and the worst part? There is a direct link between the presence of these particles and diseases like Alzheimer's and Parkinson's! The plastic we use every day is no longer just polluting the environment... it is now threatening our brains and our mental and physical health!

How does microplastic reach our brain?

The problem is that plastic enters our bodies through very simple things in our daily lives:

  • Drinking water: whether from the tap or bottled in plastic.
  • Ready-made or frozen foods: especially those wrapped or preserved in plastic.
  • Spoons and cooking tools: plastic or cheap Teflon can leak particles into food.
  • Cosmetics: like scrubs or creams containing fine plastic particles.
  • Toothpaste: especially cheap types that contain plastic microbeads.

These particles are so small that they enter our bodies through breathing or swallowing, then pass from the digestive system into the blood, reaching the brain by penetrating the "Blood-Brain Barrier," which is supposed to protect the brain from harmful substances.

When it reaches the brain... what happens?

Here lies the real danger:

  • It causes chronic inflammation in brain tissues, which can damage nerve cells.
  • It affects the transmission of nerve signals, causing confusion in thinking and memory.
  • It leads to a decline in memory, focus, and overall behavior.
  • It disrupts immunity and hormones because the brain controls many systems in the body.
  • Over time, it can cause or accelerate diseases like Alzheimer's and Parkinson's!

Scientists have begun calling this phenomenon "Plastic Neurological Diseases," warning of it as a real global threat.

So, what should we do?

  • Reduce plastic use in your daily life as much as possible.
  • Avoid heating food in plastic containers, especially in the microwave.
  • Drink from glass or stainless steel, and avoid drinking hot liquids in plastic.
  • Check the ingredients of the toothpaste and cosmetics you use.
  • If you work in a factory or environment involving plastic, be careful and take proper precautions.

This is not a matter of luxury or exaggeration... it is a direct threat to our health and our children's health. We must pay attention and spread awareness before we regret it! May God protect everyone.

content.en:
Vibe Coding & Firebase Studio: A Programming Revolution or a Looming Disaster?

If you haven't heard of Vibe Coding or Firebase Studio yet, you're missing out on a massive shift happening in the programming world! Suddenlyâ€¦ an app idea that used to take months is being executed without writing a single line of code! Yes, reallyâ€¦ it has literally become "just talk, and let AI do the work"!

What is Vibe Coding?

Simply put, you describe your idea in natural language like: "I want an app to organize my daily tasks with a dark mode," or even draw a simple sketchâ€¦ and the AI generates the entire code for you! This concept was started by Andrej Karpathy in February 2025, calling it "Vibe Coding," and indeed, the whole world began moving toward it rapidly.

What is Firebase Studio: The Next Generation of Development Tools

In April 2025, Google announced Firebase Studio â€” the first cloud development environment to actually support Vibe Coding.

What does it offer?

  • You write your ideaâ€¦ and AI transforms it into a full application (Frontend & Backend).
  • Supports languages like: Java, Python, Node.js, Go, .NET.
  • Compatible with frameworks like: React, Angular, Flutter, Android.
  • Uses Gemini AI to assist with documentation, migration, and testing.
  • Ability to deploy the app immediately to Firebase Hosting or Cloud Run.
  • The interface is similar to VS Codeâ€¦ you'll feel right at home!

Current Preview Version:

  • Standard User: 3 workspaces.
  • Google Developer: Up to 30 workspaces.

Is this a danger to programmers?

It could be a disasterâ€¦ if you rely on it blindly! If you don't understand the project structure or the code written by the AI, you'll enter a loop of fixing bugs without understanding what it's doing. However, if you do understand, it will be a powerful tool that saves you time and lets you focus on creativity instead of routine.

Conclusion:

Have Vibe Coding and Firebase Studio changed the rules of the game? We can now turn any idea into a real app in record time, without extensive technical experience. But the question arises: should we reject this change? Or should we develop ourselves and live with it? What's certain isâ€¦ what's coming is even more powerful, and AI will be a true partner for every developer.

The Future Came Faster Than Expectedâ€¦ and the Danger is Everywhere!

I previously wrote in several posts about the dangers of Artificial Intelligence (AI) and how it is exploited in blackmail and scandals. I used to say it was complex and difficultâ€¦ but now? It has become much easier!

Your photos are not safe!

Anyone now can take a photo from your social media accounts and, in seconds, overlay it onto malicious videos and imagesâ€¦ and the blackmail begins! This advice is for everyone: any image uploaded to the internet is not safe, no matter how much you adjust your privacy settings.

How can you protect yourself?

  1. Reduce uploading personal photos to social media (if you are a girl, it's better to avoid it entirely).
  2. If necessary, keep your accounts private and carefully review your followers (though this is not a complete solution).
  3. Delete any old photos that could be stolen and exploited.
  4. Never send private photos to anyone on any application, no matter what.
  5. Do not accept friend requests from unknown people.
  6. Always use protection software and a VPN when needed.

Important Note:

This message is for everyoneâ€¦ but the truth is that girls face a greater risk, so their awareness must be higher. Take care of yourselves; no one will protect you more than you protect yourself.

Conclusion:

Now, a single image can destroy a person's lifeâ€¦ Be mindful of your privacy and protect yourself without leaving a chance for anyone to exploit you. If this matters to a friend, share this post with them!

What's the story? April 14, 2025â€¦ a federal court in Washington is witnessing one of the most dangerous trials in social media history! Meta (formerly Facebook) is accused of monopoly due to its acquisition of Instagram (2012) and WhatsApp (2014).

"Instead of competingâ€¦ you buy your competitors and finish them off!" The Federal Trade Commission (FTC) says Meta follows a "buy or bury" policy. If the court rules against Metaâ€¦ it will be forced to sell Instagram and WhatsApp. This will shake the social media market and introduce new competitors.

Politics are involved

Trump returned to power and changed the FTC leadership. Mark Zuckerberg is trying to get closer to him with a million-dollar donation to his campaign and millions in settlements, and furtherâ€¦ he decided to cancel news fact-checking programs!

If Meta loses?

  • The market will open up to competitors like TikTok, YouTube, and Snap.

What does Meta say?

  • "We bought with government approval at the time."
  • "We face heavy competitors like TikTok, X (Twitter), and YouTube."
  • "Splitting the apps will harm usersâ€¦ because they are now interconnected."

This is the largest trial against a tech company in 40 years, and the future of social media is being decided now. The resultâ€¦ either the dismantling of Meta or more control.

The whole world is focused on this caseâ€¦ If Meta loses, social media will changeâ€¦ If it wins, the monopoly will continue! And weâ€¦ will see the result very soon.

The Image is Not Always Real: A Hidden Threat to Your Privacy via AI!

A post has spread warning about AI applications used to remove clothing from photos, linking the issue to the case of (B.K), who was blackmailed with forged photos and tragically ended her life. Is this true? And how can we protect ourselves?

Yes, unfortunately, such programs exist

There are tools using Deep Learning techniques to modify images very realistically. Apps that appeared before were shut down after major backlash, but unfortunately, new alternatives have emerged on the internet and Telegram. These apps analyze body shape and lighting to forge an image, making it look real, which opens the door for blackmail and violation.

B.K: A Victim of Merciless Technology

B.K was a young girl who was blackmailed with forged photos and rumors, leading to immense psychological pressure and the end of her life. What happened to B.K is not an individual case; many others, especially girls, face this type of extortion.

Is there a solution?

There is a website called StopNCII.org, a trusted global site that works with platforms like Facebook, Instagram, and TikTok. It creates a "digital fingerprint" of the forged image without storing it, and when it finds a similar image online, it notifies the platform to remove it automatically.

Features:

  • Free and confidential
  • Protects your privacy
  • No need to contact the perpetrator

How to protect yourself?

  1. Minimize sharing personal photos, especially on public accounts.
  2. Always secure your privacy settings.
  3. Do not use unknown apps for photo editing.
  4. If blackmail occurs, report it immediately to the police and use tools like StopNCII.
  5. Educate our children and families about technological risks.

What does the law say?

In Egypt, Law No. 175 of 2018 punishes electronic blackmail and the publication of forged images, but implementation and awareness are most important.

Conclusion:

Artificial Intelligence can be a tool for construction or destruction, and the existence of such programs is a real danger. B.K is not just a name; it's an alarm bell. Protect yourself, educate others, and always be cautious.

America on the Verge of Economic Explosion.. Ray Dalio Reveals the Catastrophe!

The man who accurately warned of the 2008 crisisâ€¦ Ray Dalio, is now saying: "The US economy is standing on the edgeâ€¦ and a great depression is coming!" Why? Because there are serious indicators that no one can ignoreâ€¦

National Debt.. A bomb that forces you to count to 10

Imagine that US debt has reached $36.2 trillion, more than a third of the entire world's debt! The disaster? Interest on the debt will exceed $952 billion in 2025 and could reach $1.8 trillion within 10 years. Dalio likened this situation to "financial fat" that could cause an economic stroke if no one acts.

Trump Tariffs.. A blazing trade war

Ray attacked Trump's policies when he raised tariffs insanely on China, Canada, Mexico, and Europe, which led to:

  • Increased prices
  • Raised inflation
  • Created global trade tension

China responded with 125% tariffs on US products, making the situation ripe for a trade warâ€¦ like what happened before the 1929 depression.

5 Forces Pressuring the World

Dalio explained that there are 5 factors working together to accelerate the crisis:

  1. Huge debts between countries like the US (debtor) and China (creditor).
  2. Internal political division hindering solutions.
  3. Escalating global tensions flipping the market.
  4. Technological development threatening jobs.
  5. Climate change increasing pressure.

This makes the situation more dangerous than the 2008 and 1971 crises combined.

America Collapsing? Or is there still hope?

Dalio sees the dollar collapsing and interest rates skyrocketing. On the other hand, other economists see America as still strong, but the situation is delicate. The bigger problem is that trade volume between the US and China reaches $582 billion, and any escalation could ignite the world, especially for developing countries.

Conclusion:

Ray Dalio is ringing the alarm bell, saying: If America doesn't reduce the deficitâ€¦ solve the debt crisisâ€¦ stop trade wars and invest in technology, we will see a depression larger than 1929, and the whole world will be affectedâ€¦ including us.

Are there really no petrol price hikes until October? The government's balance plan!

At a time when people are living on their nerves due to prices skyrocketing every day, the government decided to freeze petrol prices until October 2025 instead of July 2025, following the increase that occurred in April. This decision came suddenly, especially since we are used to prices changing every 3 months with periodic meetings.

But the important question: Is this a calculated economic decision?

The increase that occurred in April was expected... but it was 2 EGP more than expected! On April 11, 2025, the government announced new petrol prices as follows:

  • Octane 95 reached 19 EGP
  • Octane 92 at 17.25 EGP
  • Octane 80 at 15.75 EGP
  • Diesel at 15.5 EGP per liter

This increase was part of the gradual subsidy removal plan the government has been pursuing for years to reduce the budget deficit and narrow the gap between global and local market prices. The goal of the plan is to remove fuel subsidies entirely before the end of 2025, though reports suggest diesel and gas cylinders might retain some slight subsidies.

Amidst high prices and the pressure on people, this increase was very heavy, affecting everything from transportation costs to the price of bread. The government tried to calm the situation before the hike by announcing a social package including salary and pension increases expected in July to absorb the shock.

The Government: No increases before October!

The Ministry of Petroleum officially announced that there will be no further increases in petrol and diesel prices before October 2025. This is somewhat unusual since the pricing committee typically reviews prices every 3 months. Clearly, this decision is meant to give people a breather after months of pressure. The reason? Two major factors:

  1. Global oil prices have dropped
  2. Fears of a global economic recession due to Trump's policies

Global Oil: Between Decline and Anxiety!

Global market oil prices have dropped recently, which helped the government make the freezing decision: Brent crude is around $65 per barrel, and WTI is around $62. This drop happened following Trump's economic decisions that reduced market tension but simultaneously increased recession fears. The Egyptian government seized the opportunity to freeze prices temporarily for 6 months instead of just 3.

However, many experts warn: "Take note, this drop might be temporary!" Meaning if oil prices rise again, it's very likely we'll see new hikes.

Trump and Global Recession: An indirect but real impact!

Trump's policies, especially regarding tariffs and global trade, have created anxiety in the global economy. Many see us heading toward a recession wave, and this recession isn't far from us, even if we aren't at the heart of the crisis. It could reduce Egyptian remittances, affect exports, and slow down investor decisions. That's why the government chose not to raise prices now and wait to see where things are headed.

Impact on People: Temporary relief before the next wave?

The decision allows people to adapt to the increase. But frankly, subsidy removal is still ongoing, and more hikes are on the way; this truce doesn't mean the issue is over.

In the end... a smart step, but not the end of the road!

Freezing prices until October is a smart, calculated step, but it's just a warrior's rest. The government must balance economic reform with protecting people, as the pressure is on everyone. The real challenge is: how to continue this path without the citizen paying the price alone?

Trump and the Shower: The Battle of Hair and Water!

In America â€” the land of freedom â€” people are busy with something serious... not the economy, not the climate... no... "the weak shower!"

The story from the beginning:

In 1992, a law was made limiting the water flow from the shower to 2.5 gallons per minute to save water and protect the environment. Until Obama came in 2013 and said: "Not every nozzle gets its own flow... no... the 2.5 gallons are divided among all showerhead nozzles together"... meaning if you have 4 nozzles? Each barely drinks!

Trump... his hair got upset!

In 2020, the man couldn't take it anymore... and came out with a genius statement: "It's not logical to stand for 15 minutes under the shower so my beautiful hair gets wet!" The solution? An executive order making each nozzle take 2.5 gallons on its own...

But wait... the environment is screaming!

Here comes the seriousness: This decision means wasting water in a country where half suffers from terrible drought. Heating water will consume more energy... meaning skyrocketing bills. Increased carbon emissions at a time when the planet is already burning. And just so you know... showering takes about 20% of home water consumption... and in states like California and Arizona... water is more expensive than gasoline!

Freedom or Chaos?

Trump supporters see the decision as personal freedom: "I am free to bathe how I like." Environmental protection groups tell you: "You are wasting the planet's remaining water."

Where is the middle ground?

The funny thing is that there are now water-saving showerheads that actually give you a waterfall sensation... but who can convince Trump? The man is convinced that technology is a conspiracy against his hairstyle.

Conclusion:

Is the topic trivial? No... it reflects how personalizing a trivial issue can turn into a national battle and an executive order. Trump turned the "my beautiful hair" battle into a war with bureaucracy. Most of Trump's battles are usually a cover for other disasters he is doing.

The post question:

Is Trump's hair really worth all this waterfall? The answer... is inside the bathroom.

content.en:
Today officially, the US dollar is living its worst moments in years, and the global financial system that America built around its currency is unfolding one by one... So how and why? Let's tell the story! If you haven't followed what happened in the last 24 hours, prepare your tea and come dive into the details... because what is happening is not just an economic crisis, it is an earthquake that could change the shape of the world!

The dollar collapse... not just a normal drop!

In just one day, the dollar lost 1.7% of its value! And this is its biggest drop since 2022. The general index of the dollar fell 8% since the beginning of the year, and broke the 100-point level for the first time in two years!

  • The Swiss Franc jumped 3.6% ahead of it
  • The Euro and the Yen rose by 2.47% and 2%

All markets became terrified... because this is the first time the dollar, bonds, and American stocks collapse together!

American policies... child's play!

The main reason? Floundering economic policies from Trump! Decisions changing every day, between imposing tariffs and cancelling them, to the extent that the market is no longer confident in the direction of America! The "Dow Jones" index lost thousands of points in a few days... and the stock market has become like a swing!

Loss of confidence: the real danger!

Today the danger is not only economic... it is also political and psychological! Analyst "Marc Chandler" said: "The biggest loss currently is America's reputation as an economic power!" Foreign investors have begun to escape from the American market, and withdraw their money quicklyâ€¦ and this is what is called a "Capital Strike".

  • 10-year bond yields reached 4.49% (highest level since 2001)
  • And the 30-year reached 4.87% (higher than 1987)

This means that America is paying higher interest to convince people to buy its bonds!

Is this the beginning of the end of the dollar?!

Great doubts are appearing about the future of the dollar as a global reserve currency. Now China, Europe, and the Gulf states are starting to deal in their local currencies instead of the dollar... which is economically called: De-dollarization. These movements are happening quickly... and America is unable to stop them!

So where is the money going?!

  • Gold is back to sit on the throne and recorded the highest price in its history!
  • Bitcoin is on the scene as a real competitor!

A report from "Grayscale" says that Bitcoin could compete with gold as an asset to store value, especially with the collapse of confidence in the dollar.

The world is changing before our eyes!

What is happening now is not a passing moment... it is a reshaping of the global financial system, and the end of a stage where America was the first controller. The big question now: if the dollar falls... who will be the new king?

content.en:
Since Donald Trump returned to the presidency in January 2025, the aviation sector in America has entered a spiral of controversy and fear. Accidents have increased, and people have begun to link between the new policies and the changes that happenedâ€¦ especially with Elon Musk entering as one of the most important government advisors. Let me tell the story from the beginningâ€¦

Aviation accidents shook America within months!

Washington disaster â€“ January 30, 2025:

A passenger plane hit a military helicopter, and they fell into the Potomac Riverâ€¦ and everyone who was in it died. Trump came out writing on "Truth Social": "Why didn't the helicopter change its path?" People were shocked, not only from the accident, but also from a clear imbalance between civil and military aviation.

Black February:

Other accidents happened in Philadelphia and Alaska. Details are still not complete, but the catastrophe is that they happened after decisions to lay off employees in the FAA! Analysts said: "How can we reduce the cadres that secure the skies and be surprised when accidents happen?"

Death of a high official in a terrifying accident

German media confirmed the death of Augustin Escobar, CEO of Siemens, along with his family after a helicopter crash over the Hudson River. With him were his wife and children (aged 4, 5, and 11) and also the pilot. The news shocked New York, and the company is in mourning. Investigations are ongoing, but there are questions about the management of the airspace, and the imbalance that has become clear to everyone.

Trump savesâ€¦ but at the expense of safety?

In his second term, Trump began reducing federal spending, starting with the FAA. Laying off hundreds â€“ even if not from the controllers â€“ created pressure on those present, and increased the possibility of human error. Other than that, imposing tariffs on vital aviation imports, like spare parts, made companies slow down maintenanceâ€¦ and that is a big danger!

Elon Muskâ€¦ the billionaire who runs the sky?

Musk became the leader of the aviation surveillance system development project, and runs the "Department of Government Efficiency". He brought SpaceX to build a modern system, and they said it is "safer and smarter". But critics said: rushing without testing could bring a counter-result. Other than that, Musk is accused of conflict of interestâ€¦ because he benefits from huge government contracts.

Logical analysis: Are they the reason?

Accidents are always the result of many factors: malfunctions, weather, human errorsâ€¦ but:

  • Reducing cadres
  • Sudden changes in sensitive systems
  • Political and media pressure
  • Lack of investment in safety

All this creates a dangerous environment. There is hope in the updates that Musk is leadingâ€¦ but if they don't happen with caution, we could be experimenting with people's lives.

Conclusion

What is happening is not a coincidenceâ€¦ these accidents are an alarm bell. We want development? Yes, of course. But not at the expense of safety. Bold policies need smarter implementation, not faster.

If you are sitting and looking at the dollarâ€¦ it's almost stable, but the Euro and the Pound Sterling are going up! Don't worry, teacherâ€¦ these are Uncle Trump's old policies that did that. Any currency that was pegged to the dollar remained stable with it. What happened is that the Euro and the Pound Sterling are the ones that rose against all the currencies pegged to the dollar.

What about Gold?

The same storyâ€¦ the price of gold globally increases against the dollar, and any currency pegged to the dollar, of course, the price increases for it as well.

Currency rates against the Euro in 3 days from April 9 to April 12:

April 9, 2025:

  • Egyptian Pound: 56.54 EGP
  • US Dollar: 1.10 dollars
  • Saudi Riyal: 4.11 riyals
  • Kuwaiti Dinar: 0.34 dinar
  • Pound Sterling: 0.85 pounds

April 12, 2025:

  • Egyptian Pound: 58.26 EGP increase of 3.04%
  • US Dollar: 1.14 dollars increase of 3.63%
  • Saudi Riyal: 4.26 riyals increase of 3.65%
  • Kuwaiti Dinar: 0.35 dinar increase of 2.94%
  • Pound Sterling: 0.87 pounds increase of 2.35%

Meaning the average increase is 3.112%

Gold ounce prices (31.10 grams 24 carat) in 3 days from April 9 to April 12:

  • April 9: 3082.18 US dollars, meaning the gram is 99.11 dollars
  • April 12: 3236.21 US dollars, meaning the gram is 104.06 dollars

Meaning an increase of 4.997%, which is about 4.95 dollars, meaning the equivalent of about 254.1 Egyptian pounds in just 3 days

So how much was the 24 carat gram on April 9 and how much is it today approximately?

  • April 9: 5080 EGP approximately
  • April 12: 5371 EGP approximately

Meaning the increase is about 291 EGP, which is an increase of 5.73%, meaning higher than the global percentage by 0.733%, meaning almost the local increase rate is close to the global increase. You will find in the comments pictures showing the rise in the value of the Euro and the Pound Sterling against almost all currencies, including the dollar.

A movie? No... that's reality! Imagine a president of a superpower like America, deciding to play a stock market game with his people! In one day, Trump crashed the market with his own hand, and hours later raised it again, and in the middle? He earned millions and made ordinary people lose their life savings!

Let me tell you from the beginningâ€¦

A few days ago, Trump imposed massive tariffs on China, reaching 125%! (Currently reached 145% at the time of writing the post, and I hope it doesn't increase by the time it's published) Markets literally collapsedâ€¦ America's stock market lost about 10 trillion dollars, and small investors started selling stocks at a loss for fear of a complete collapse. The market became terrifiedâ€¦ and as we were saying "it's over", Trump entered the second stage of his plan.

The tweet that flipped the market:

In the midst of the market collapse, Trump came out on the "Truth Social" platform and said: "Time to buy... DJT" which is the name of his company listed on the stock exchange. Simply put, he is signaling to the people around him: "Buy now, things will adjust in a while!" And just 4 hours after this tweet, suddenly... he announced the postponement of taxes for 90 days!

The result? The market jumped!

  • S&P 500 index increased 9.5%
  • 4 trillion dollars entered the market in one day
  • Trump's company stock DJT increased more than 22%
  • And Trump's own fortune increased by 415 million dollars in an hour!

And the surprise? Minutes before the announcement, there were massive trades on the stocks that would benefit... meaning people "knew"!

So who knew?

Charles Schwab, a billionaire from Trump's circle, earned 2.5 billion dollars on the same day. A leaked video from inside the White House shows Trump laughing and saying: "This one made 2.5 billion, and that one 900 millionâ€¦ not bad!"

And this opens the door to terrifying questions...

Were Trump's plans a tight conspiracy? British businessman Mark Tilbury added his analysis of this game and said: "What is the use of this chaos for Trump?" And he answered himself:

  • Huge negotiating influence with trading partners
  • Wall Street rise of 10%, which Trump called a "victory"
  • Portraying China as a trade enemy after suspending fees on other countries

Tilbury said: "People see that Trump is manipulating markets, but I see it as a deliberate strategic step." All this was part of a big plan for personal gain and strengthening the President's power.

And the victims? The poor people!

The small investor who believed Trump and sold to save himselfâ€¦ the people who thought their president would return "Make America Great Again"! but the truth? It was the largest wealth transfer process from the people to the rich!

---

Conclusion: Trump Played Pump & Dump!

He crashed the market himself, bought stocks knowing what was coming, and then raised it againâ€¦ this is a well-known scam plan called Pump and Dump, and what happened was a harsh lesson for everyone who still thinks the market is fair.

Is this legal?

Congress caught fire, and senators accused him of corruption and manipulation... but the White House responded and said: "The President has the right to reassure the market!" And the disaster? Hedge funds have started programming algorithms based on his tweets!

Is America changing?

Has the stock market become a game in the hand of a president? Will the people wake up before the game is completed? All this happened with a "tweet"... and a calculated plan!

From the first day the white man entered the land of the Americas, a long series of crimes against the indigenous people began... whom the world knew as the "Red Indians". But what people don't always know is that these crimes weren't just traditional wars, no... they were organized, systematic genocide, blessed by the state itself, headed by the United States of America.

Forced Sterilization: Official Policy Against Fertility

In the sixties and seventies, the US government through the Indian Health Service (IHS) began implementing forced sterilization of thousands of indigenous women. Women would go into hospitals thinking they were having a simple operation, and come out sterilized for life, without knowing! An official report in 1976 revealed that from 25% to 50% of women in some reservations were subjected to this type of medical torture. America used medicine as a weapon, to strike an entire generation out of existence.

Smallpox Blankets: Intention to Kill from Top Leadership

In 1763, the British commander Jeffrey Amherst â€“ with clear support from the colonial administration â€“ suggested distributing blankets contaminated with smallpox to resistant tribes! He said it clearly in an official speech: "Could it not be contrived to send the Small Pox among those disaffected tribes of Indians?" Although actual implementation is not certain, the mere suggestion of the idea by top leadership, with implicit approval, shows how much these lives were worth nothing to them. And the most dangerous thing? That the United States afterwards not only remained silent about what happened... it continued on the same approach in dealing.

Bison Destruction: The Weapon of Hunger Under the State Flag

The bison â€“ the American buffalo â€“ was an entire life for the plains tribes. Food, clothes, tools, and everything. But America decided to starve them to death. In the period between 1865 and 1885, more than 30 million bison were killed, with official blessing and encouragement. General Sheridan, commander of the US Army, said it: "Kill the bison, and the Indians' world will end." Indeed, starvation was a certified tool of war. Either surrender and enter the reservation, or die.

How many victims?

Before colonization, the indigenous inhabitants of North America were about 5 to 15 million. By the 19th century, 90% of them had disappeared. Between diseases, wars, displacement, and starvation... all under the eye of the state.

Conclusion

content.en:
Today the world is witnessing a decisive moment, but not on a military frontâ€¦ this is a purely economic front, and what is happening now is not just numbers or customs. The issue is much bigger: it is a direct confrontation between America and China, and with them the rest of the planet!

The beginning of the fire:

US President Donald Trump decided to raise tariffs on Chinese imports to 104%, an unprecedented figure. China did not remain silent and immediately responded with 84% retaliatory tariffs on American products.

Mad escalation:

Trump increased tariffs to 125%, and there are leaks saying there are suggestions to reach 500%!

Surprising statements:

US President Donald Trump said on Wednesday, April 9, that he "cannot imagine" increasing tariffs against China, hours after his administration announced raising the fees to 125%! He added to reporters at the White House: "I don't think I will have to do that," especially after reducing fees on most other countries to 10%.

Market collapse:

  • The "Dow Jones" index lost 4,500 points
  • The "S&P 500" index dropped 12% in four days
  • The German "DAX" and French "CAC 40" lost more than 4%
  • Panic took over: People are stockpiling sugar, rice, and Coca-Cola like during the COVID days!

The suspicious surprise:

Trump suddenly announced a freeze on tariffs for the rest of the world for 90 days, and said verbatim: "World leaders are begging me and kissing my ass to stop the tariffs!" He is the one who said that.

Market rebound:

  • The "S&P 500" index rose 9.52% in one day
  • "Nasdaq" achieved the second highest rise in its history
  • Markets breathed, but it was the calm before the storm!

Fiery threats:

The US Treasury Secretary said that America is considering delisting Chinese companies from US stock exchanges! He described China as the "worst player in global trade".

China responds with fire:

  • Issued orders to banks to reduce dollar purchases
  • Started supporting the Yuan in international trade
  • The goal? To break the dollar's dominance!

Europe enters the arena:

  • The European Union is voting on 25% tariffs on $21 billion worth of US imports
  • In an important development: After Macron's visit to Egypt, he announced that he intends to officially recognize the State of Palestine â€” a step against American and Israeli policies.

The system is changing:

  • Supply chains are dismantling
  • Economic alliances are being rebuilt from scratch
  • Currencies are fighting each other

The most important message:

The next stage is not for the survival of the richestâ€¦ but for the strongest who can withstand the fire for as long as possible and seize the opportunity to be with the alliance that will shape the new economy. America, led by Trump, is betting on burning everyoneâ€¦ to remain standing alone amidst the ashes!

content.en:
What happened the day before yesterday in America is not just ordinary protests.. this could be the first spark of a real revolution, not only against a president like Trump, but against an entire economic and political system falling before our eyes moment by moment.

The scene is changing before you now!

In more than 50 states, millions of Americans took to the streets chanting against Trump and his policies, especially the recent decision that turned the world upside down: imposing massive tariffs on all imported goods, reaching 50% for countries like China, and a 10% general tariff for all other countries.

Economic collapse moment by moment!

Since the first announcement, American stock markets have taken a terrifying drop! Losses reached 10 trillion dollars in days, companies like "Tesla", "Amazon", and "Meta" lost billions. Investors are in a state of panic, and global markets were directly affected because America is a fundamental part of global supply chains.

Not just an economic decision... it's a coup against the system!

This decision is not random; on the contrary, it is part of a larger plan led by Trump and Musk, aimed at dismantling the federal government, firing public employees (more than 200,000 have already been removed!), and controlling the state's joints through businessmen and billionaires loyal to them.

American values under the guillotine!

Trump doesn't stop here; he has started promoting the idea of amending the constitution to run for unlimited terms! The scenario that Americans used to denounce in third world countries is now happening on their land.. and people can't believe it!

Europe takes a stand for the first time!

After decades of dependency, Europe is saying "enough." Germany announced a 500 billion euro armament plan for the first time since World War II, and France, Italy, and Britain imposed counter-tariffs on America.. traditional European support for Washington has begun to decline.

From Cairo.. to Paris.. to Washington

France is now getting closer to Egypt more than ever, and Macron visited Cairo and praised military cooperation, and rejected the displacement project supported by America and Israel. Egypt has become a pivotal partner in alliances forming away from traditional American influence.

And China and Russia? They are building the alternative!

China and Russia are not just watching, no! Direct support for Iran, political movements in the Middle East, new economic channels are forming rapidly. The scene has become clear: alliances are changing, and the unipolarity that America imposed is dying slowly.

People woke up.. but also the elites!

Big politicians and financiers who supported Trump have begun to back down, because what is happening has become bigger than their ability to control. The street is boiling, the economy is falling, the system is dismantling.. and all this is happening before our eyes in a very compressed time frame.

We are at a historic breaking point! What is happening is not just political or economic crises.. it is a turning point, the beginning of the end of a world order built after World War II, of which America was at the top. This system no longer serves the interests of the peoples, and everyone is rebelling against it: from the American street to the leaders of Europe and Asia.

The real question: Where do we stand in this?

The world is changing.. we won't be able to stay on the sidelines. Every country, and every person, will be affected by these shifts: a new economy, new alliances, rising powers and others falling. Are we ready? Or will we wake up too late?

content.en:
An Unforgettable Lesson from History

During the Mongol invasions, Khorasan was the first victim. Thousands were killed while others stayed silent, hoping for safety through neutrality. Two years later, Baghdad fell, and over a million people were massacred.

The Levant: Repeating the Same Mistake

Despite what happened to Iraq, the people of the Levant sought peace treaties with the Mongols. Consequently, Damascus was occupied, and Aleppo and Homs were destroyed. History was repeating itself as the catastrophe moved from one city to the next.

Egypt's Role and Qutuz's Stance

The Mamluks in Egypt initially leaned toward peace until Sultan Qutuz and Sheikh Al-Izz ibn Abd al-Salam took a firm stand. Qutuz famously asked:
"O leaders of Muslims; who is for Islam if not us?"

  • He executed the Mongol messengers to end any possibility of surrender.
  • He prepared the army with unwavering resolve.
  • He led from the front lines.

The Battle of Ain Jalut: "Wa Islamah!"

In the heat of battle, Qutuz's horse was killed, but he continued fighting on foot. He removed his helmet and shouted his famous cry: "Wa Islamah!" (O Islam!). This cry revitalized the soldiers and led to the total defeat of the Mongols, shattering their myth of invincibility.

The Lesson

  • Inaction in the face of injustice eventually brings that injustice to your doorstep.
  • Courage is not just about strength; it's about saying 'no' when everyone else says 'yes'.

Who is Right Regarding the Eid Crescent Sighting?

People are divided between Eid being on Sunday or Monday, but from my perspective, Eid will be on Monday. Here is why:

As mentioned previously, sighting the crescent on Ramadan 29 with the naked eye was nearly impossible. Therefore, it was wise to expect 30 days of Ramadan unless proven otherwise.

Who provides the proof?

Egypt's Dar al-Ifta and its authorized observatories are the religious authorities in this matter. While many countries rely on astronomical calculations, let's look at the details.

Scientific Details of the Sighting

  • Astronomical research confirmed the new moon's birth on Ramadan 29, but the gap between sunset and moonset was only 13 minutes.
  • This makes naked-eye sighting nearly impossible and requires advanced technology not available to everyone.

In the Prophet's ï·º time, fasting and breaking the fast depended on visual sighting. Astronomy is important for confirmation but should not be the sole primary source for religious rulings.

Conclusion

The correct course of action is following Dar al-Ifta's announcement of the non-sighting of the moon, making Ramadan 30 days and Eid on Monday, God willing.

The Narcissism Trap: Uncovering Secrets of Narcissistic Personality (Part 3 & Final)

The Difference Between Narcissism and Self-Confidence

Introduction:

  • Many confuse self-confidence with narcissism because both involve self-admiration. However, the difference is like poison versus the antidote.
  • A confident person appreciates themselves without belittling others, while a narcissist sees themselves as the center of the universe.

Narcissist vs. Confident Individual

  • Confident Person: Values themselves, accepts criticism, respects others' feelings, and doesn't need to constantly prove superiority.
  • Narcissist: Feels entitled, rejects criticism as an attack, seeks constant attention, and exploits others without guilt.

Are you dealing with a Narcissist? Ask yourself:

  • Do they always turn the conversation back to themselves?
  • Do they get upset without constant praise?
  • Do they belittle your feelings or problems?

How to Protect Yourself?

  • Set boundaries: Don't allow control.
  • Don't try to change them: It's a waste of energy.
  • Keep it superficial: Avoid sharing personal details to prevent manipulation.

Conclusion

Self-confidence is positive; narcissism is a delusion of superiority. Understanding this helps you avoid toxic traps and build healthy self-esteem.

In a controversial move, U.S. Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth sports a tattoo of the Arabic word "Kafir" (Infidel) topped with the Latin phrase Deus Vult (God wills it), a historic Crusader slogan.

Disturbing Symbols and Meanings

  • Jerusalem Cross: Linked to the Crusades; its presence contributed to his prior dismissal during the Biden era.
  • The Sword Verse: A tattoo of a verse from the Gospel of Matthew: "I did not come to bring peace, but a sword."
  • Political Context: Hegseth played a key role in persuading Trump to pardon Blackwater mercenaries involved in the Nisour Square massacre in Iraq.

Double Standards in Politics

This extremism extends to administrative decisions, such as Trump's restructuring of the Education Department to allow religious influence over curricula. A clear contradiction exists between their rhetoric and lifestyles:

  • Trump: A life of partying and scandals despite promoting a discourse of virtue.
  • Elon Musk: Multiple children from various women with lack of stable family commitment.
  • Pete Hegseth: Issues with alcohol and personal scandals, while using religious slogans to justify military actions.

Conclusion

Double standards repeat throughout history; religion is often used as a tool for control rather than a moral guide. When political figures preach ethics while practicing the opposite, their true motives must be questioned.

Eid on Sunday or Monday? Is Ramadan 29 or 30 Days?

I previously mentioned that the new moon will be born on Ramadan 29, but will it be easily spotted? That is the real challenge.

Why is visibility difficult?

As mentioned before, on Ramadan 29, sunset will be at 6:12 PM and moonset at 6:25 PM. This means the moon stays on the horizon for only 13 minutes after sunset.

  • Illumination Percentage: At the moment of sunset, the moon's illumination will be less than 1% (approx. 0.18%).
  • Visibility: This makes sighting nearly impossible with the naked eye, requiring advanced astronomical equipment for accurate detection.

Conclusion

The decision is not solely astronomical; Egypt's Dar al-Ifta and certified observatories must confirm the sighting before officially announcing Eid.

Simply put, do not listen to rumors. Wait for the official announcement from Dar al-Ifta and assume Ramadan is 30 days until proven otherwise on the 29th.

The "Graphite" Malware: A New Spyware Weapon Threatening the World

On January 31, 2025, WhatsApp warned 90 people across 24 countries that their devices were compromised by advanced spyware called "Graphite."

Developed by the Israeli company "Paragon," this tool is led by former intelligence figures, including Ehud Barak and former Unit 8200 commander Ehud Schneorson.

How does "Graphite" infect devices?

The method is terrifying: you don't even need to click a link. Simply being added to a WhatsApp group where a PDF is sent can trigger the infection. As the app attempts to auto-preview the file, the malware activates, granting hackers access to messages, photos, and calls.

Crucially, it affects both Android and iPhone, suggesting the vulnerability lies within WhatsApp itself rather than the operating system.

Paragon: Security Firm or Surveillance Tool?

While Paragon markets itself as a security firm, it acts as an extension of Israeli intelligence. Targeting activists and journalists reveals its true purpose: monitoring opposition to the Zionist entity.

Graphite vs. Pegasus

While Pegasus relied on WhatsApp calls to infect devices, Graphite only requires a PDF within a group chat. This silent, passive method is much harder to detect.

How to protect yourself?

  • Update WhatsApp regularly to patch vulnerabilities.
  • Avoid unknown groups and do not accept files from untrusted sources.
  • Use robust security software to monitor for unusual activity.

Conclusion

Graphite is a cyber-weapon showcasing the global reach of information control. As long as such firms operate freely, anyone using a smartphone remains a potential target.

content.en:
The Narcissism Trap: Uncovering Secrets of Narcissistic Personality (Part 2)

Impact of Narcissistic Personalities on the Workplace

Introduction:

  • You've likely met someone at work who loves the spotlight, takes all the credit, and ignores the team's efforts. This person might be a narcissist.
  • A narcissist may initially succeed due to high self-confidence, but over time, their negative impact creates a toxic and stressful environment.

How do Narcissists Affect the Workplace?

  • Monopolizing Success: Taking all the credit for collective efforts.
  • Rejecting Criticism: Viewing feedback as a personal attack, hindering growth.
  • Creating a Toxic Environment: Dominating and belittling others to stay on top.
  • Manipulating Colleagues: Using false flattery or emotional manipulation to gain influence.

Types of Narcissists at Work

  • The Overt Narcissist: Boasts constantly and seeks to be the center of attention.
  • The Covert Narcissist: Appears humble but uses guilt and manipulation to control others.
  • The Exploitative Narcissist: Uses others' efforts for personal gain.
  • The Aggressive Narcissist: Enjoys creating conflicts and chaos.

How to Deal with a Narcissist at Work?

  1. Starve them of attention: Ignoring provocative behavior reduces their influence over you.
  2. Be direct: Use clear, firm language and don't allow room for ambiguity.
  3. Maintain professionalism: Focus on your work and avoid unnecessary conflicts.
  4. Protect your boundaries: If your mental health is affected, consider talking to management or seeking a better environment.

Conclusion

Dealing with a narcissist is a test of your soft skills. Understanding their nature allows you to manage the relationship without draining your energy or productivity.
