Is Ramadan 29 or 30 Days?

The matter depends on the available technology and visibility conditions on the day of the Shawwal moon sighting, as astronomically, the new moon will be born on Saturday, Ramadan 29.

Does this mean Ramadan will be 29 days? Not necessarily! The moon will be born, but its illumination will be about 0.1%, which is almost non-existent.

Timings on Ramadan 29:

  • Sunset: 6:12 PM
  • Moonset: 6:25 PM

This means the moon will disappear from the horizon only 13 minutes after sunset!

What does this mean?

Without modern equipment and ideal weather conditions, it will be very difficult to see the crescent on the 29th. Therefore, Ramadan is likely to complete 30 days, God willing.

Attached are videos showing the shape of the crescent on the 29th, the timing of the new moon's birth, and the moonset times.

It won't be easy at all, so expect Ramadan to be 30 days until the official announcement from the Egyptian Dar al-Ifta on Saturday.

Major Security Scandal: American Journalist Accidentally Joins Secret White House Meeting on Signal!

In a story stranger than fiction, Jeffrey Goldberg, editor-in-chief of The Atlantic, suddenly found himself in a secret Signal chat group with top US officials! The group included the Secretary of Defense, National Security Advisor, and Secretary of State, discussing military plans to strike the Houthis in Yemenâ€”all in front of a journalist without anyone noticing!

How did the journalist enter the group?

It wasn't a hack or espionage, but a "human error"â€”someone accidentally added Goldberg's number to the group!

  • On March 11, Goldberg received a connection request on Signal from someone named â€œMichael Waltz.â€ Despite his doubts, he accepted.
  • Two days later, he was added to a group called "Houthi Small Group." The first message was about coordinating on the Houthi situation over the next 72 hours.
  • The group contained 18 prominent officials, including NSC members and Trump advisors.
  • On March 15, Goldberg saw messages containing operational details of strikes in Yemen!

A Security Disaster Threatening Lives

  • At 13:45, Goldberg waited for the news, and just 10 minutes later, reports on X confirmed explosions in Yemen!
  • After leaving the group, he contacted officials. Brian Hughes, an NSC spokesperson, finally admitted a "wrong number was inadvertently added."

National security lawyers confirmed that discussing classified military operations on Signal could violate the US Espionage Act, which requires such discussions to occur in secure facilities (SCIF) or via encrypted government devices.

A Harsh Lesson in Cybersecurity

  • This scandal reveals the danger of human negligence in politics and national security.
  • When a superpower like the US makes such a mistake, the threat isn't just from hackers, but from primitive errors that can carry a very high price!

content.en:
Can You Live Without Your Phone for 72 Hours?

Imagine your life without notifications, social media, calls, or even a quick video! If the mere idea makes you uncomfortable, the issue is more serious than you think.

The Phone: A Silent Addiction

Recent studies show that phone addiction affects your brain in the same way as smoking or drugs. The moment you step away, your body enters a real withdrawal state.

What happens to your brain during a 72-hour detox?

Day 1 (The first 24 hours): Anxiety and Stress
You'll feel like something is missing, and your hand will reflexively reach for your phone. Your brain craves the quick dopamine hits from notifications.

Day 2 (After 48 hours): The Beginning of Change
Your brain starts to adapt. Your focus improves, your attention to surroundings increases, and your sleep becomes deeper without blue light interference.

Day 3 (After 72 hours): Freedom and Mental Clarity!
Stress levels drop significantly. You'll feel happiness unrelated to likes or notifications. Researchers found that addiction centers in the brain reduce their activity as your mind restores its natural state.

Why is it dangerous?

  • Constant notifications grabbing your attention.
  • Infinite scrolling on social media.
  • Short videos stealing your time.

Try a "Digital Fast"!

Just as you fast from food, try fasting from your phone for 3 days and see the difference for yourself. Do you have the willpower?

The Narcissism Trap: Uncovering Secrets of Narcissistic Personality (Part 1)

Narcissistic Personality: Traits, Causes, and Impact on Others

Introduction:

  • You've probably met someone who loves themselves excessively and wants to be the center of attention. This could be a narcissist.
  • Narcissism is not just vanity; it's a personality disorder that affects how a person thinks and interacts with others.

Core Traits of Narcissistic Personality

  • Grandiosity and Superiority: Feeling better than everyone else.
  • Excessive Need for Admiration: Constantly seeking praise.
  • Lack of Empathy: Inability to feel the emotions of others.
  • Exploitation: Using others to achieve personal goals.
  • Hypersensitivity to Criticism: Seeing any critique as a personal attack.

Possible Causes

  • Biological Factors: Potential genetic links.
  • Upbringing: Either extreme harshness or excessive spoiling.
  • Emotional Trauma: Using narcissism as a defense mechanism against neglect or bullying.

Impact on Relationships

  • Control: Wanting to dominate every situation.
  • Belittling Others: Making others feel inferior to stay on top.
  • Manipulation: Using guilt to maintain control.

How to Deal with a Narcissist

  • Set Clear Boundaries: Protect your personal space.
  • Avoid Arguments: Discussions are often a waste of energy.
  • Protect Your Mental Health: Focus on yourself and limit contact if necessary.

Conclusion

Understanding narcissism helps in dealing with it healthily. Upcoming parts will cover narcissism at work and the difference between narcissism and self-confidence.

Egyptian Caracal Attacks Israeli Soldiers.. A Strange Incident Sparks Social Media!

- In a strange and unexpected incident on the Egyptian-Israeli border in Ramadan 2025, an Egyptian Caracal, one of the rarest wild predators in the region, became the hero of the story!
- The Caracal attacked a group of Israeli soldiers at Mount Harif, resulting in various injuries and causing chaos and panic.

What happened?

- On March 21, 2025, Israeli soldiers were at their military post on the border when an Egyptian Caracal suddenly appeared out of nowhere.
- Before they realized it, it pounced on them, causing serious injuries with its strong bites and sharp scratches.
- Authorities eventually captured it after it left several soldiers injured. It was transferred to a wildlife hospital for examination.

What is the Egyptian Caracal?

  • The Egyptian Caracal (Caracal caracal) is a rare predator from the wild cat family.
  • It is distinguished by its long ears with black tufts and its extreme speed in jumping and hunting.
  • It lives in deserts and mountainous areas in Egypt and North Africa, usually avoiding humans unless extreme hunger or environmental changes drive it out.

Reactions after the incident?

  • Egyptian Media: Focused on the importance of the Caracal as a rare animal vital for ecological balance.
  • Social Media: Erupted with sarcastic comments like "The Caracal has joined the resistance!" citing Quranic verses about God's unseen soldiers.
  • Israel: Announced the soldiers' injuries and the animal's detention without further details.

Significance of the Event

Environmentally: Environmental changes affect wild animal behavior, bringing them closer to humans. Sinai hosts rare creatures that need protected environments.

Religiously: Many view it as a sign that God has soldiers unknown to man. The question remains: was this just a coincidence or a message?

Psychological Syndromes Governing Our Lives â€“ Are You a Victim? (Part 3)

Revolving Door Syndrome: Why do we return to the same toxic relationships?

Have you ever left an abusive relationship, only to find yourself back in it shortly after? This is known as 'Revolving Door Syndrome'.

What is the story behind Revolving Door Syndrome?

- The name comes from the idea of revolving doors, where you enter only to find yourself back where you started.
- Psychologists say the cause lies in false emotional security, psychological manipulation, and fear of the unknown.

Why do we return to toxic relationships?

  • Habituation to pain: The brain gets programmed to a certain pattern.
  • Hope for change: The illusion that "maybe this time they will change."
  • Emotional manipulation: The abuser makes you feel the problem is you.
  • Fear of loneliness: Preferring a bad situation over being alone.

Where do we see it around us?

In romantic relationships, work environments, toxic friendships, and family dynamics.

How to break the cycle?

Acknowledge the problem, break psychological attachment, set strict boundaries, seek real support, and build a new life.

Conclusion

The brain gets used to pain and hope deceives us, but change is possible, and breaking the cycle is a decision in your hands!

Israeli "Technical Superiority".. Reality or Propaganda?

- We always hear about the "Startup Nation" and that Israel is technologically superior due to exceptional skills.
- But the truth is more complex. The story involves political support, targeted funding, and long-term planning to maintain Israeli influence in the world's largest tech companies.

How does technology serve the Zionist project?

- There is a unit in the Israeli army called Unit 8200, an intelligence unit specialized in cyber espionage, similar to the American NSA.
- Israeli youth serve there during their military service, then move into the tech world, either in Big Tech (like Google, Meta, and LinkedIn) or by starting startups that are later acquired by individuals with Zionist affiliations within these large corporations.

Examples of Israeli Control in Big Tech:

  • Meta: Guy Rosen, a Unit 8200 graduate, holds the position of Chief Information Security Officer and played a role in suppressing content exposing Israeli crimes.
  • LinkedIn: Tomer Cohen, Head of Product, blocked posts exposing the occupation and acquired an Israeli company founded by 8200 alumni, allowing more Israelis into the LinkedIn system.
  • Wiz: A startup founded by four 8200 alumni, later acquired by Google, part of an inside infiltration of global technology.

Targeted Funding to Serve Israel

Itâ€™s not just about clever startups; American investment funds pump huge sums into Israeli companies. These acquisitions benefit Israel not just through profits, but also through taxes that support the occupation.

Why is this dangerous?

- Israeli influence in tech has become a means to suppress pro-Palestinian content and control information reaching the world.
- This isn't just "technological success"; it's a plan to penetrate the largest media and technical influence platforms.

How to confront this?

  • There must be awareness among people and investment funds regarding money going to support the Israeli occupation.
  • Ethics.VC works on educating investors, students, and unions about the risks of funding Israeli companies.

Psychological Syndromes Governing Our Lives â€“ Are You a Victim? (Part 2)

Lima Syndrome: When the Oppressor Empathizes with the Victim

Have you ever heard of a situation where someone started hurting another, but over time began to empathize with and help them instead of continuing their injustice?
This phenomenon is known as Lima Syndrome, the exact opposite of Stockholm Syndrome! Instead of the victim empathizing with the oppressor, the oppressor begins to feel empathy for the victim.

What is the story behind Lima Syndrome?

The term is inspired by a famous 1996 kidnapping in Lima, Peru, where rebels held hostages at the Japanese embassy for 126 days.
Over time, the captors began to empathize with the hostages and treated them with kindness, eventually releasing many of them.

Why does the oppressor empathize with the victim?

  • Sense of responsibility.
  • Psychological pressure from maintaining violence.
  • Discovering similarities between themselves and the victim.
  • Fear of future punishment or legal consequences.

Where do we see Lima Syndrome around us?

1. In Relationships: A controlling partner who starts feeling guilty and compensates for the harm caused.
2. At Work: Managers who set strict rules but later soften them after understanding their employees' suffering.
3. In Parenting: Parents who realize their harsh methods are negatively affecting their children and change their ways.

How can we benefit from Lima Syndrome?

Human communication, building empathy by learning people's stories, and admitting mistakes are key ways to utilize this phenomenon for positive change.

Conclusion

Not every oppressor will change, but Lima Syndrome proves that empathy and human connection can be the key to solving many problems in relationships, work, and society.

Psychological Syndromes Governing Our Lives â€“ Are You a Victim? (Part 1)

Stockholm Syndrome: Why does the oppressed defend their oppressor?

Stockholm Syndrome is a psychological state where the victim empathizes with the person hurting them, sometimes even justifying their actions.

What is Stockholm Syndrome?

- It started in 1973 after a bank robbery in Stockholm, Sweden.
- Psychologists explain that when a person is in a dangerous situation with no escape, the brain adapts by creating empathy for the controller to reduce stress.

Where do we see it?

1. Toxic Relationships: Staying in harmful relationships due to fear of loneliness or emotional manipulation.
2. At Work: Defending an unfair boss due to fear of job loss.
3. In Societies: Clinging to harmful traditions due to fear of change.

Why do people cling to their oppressors?

  • Fear of the unknown.
  • Normalizing pain.
  • Psychological manipulation.
  • Lack of awareness.

How to break the cycle?

  • Education and Awareness.
  • Building self-confidence.
  • Creating safe environments.
  • Critical thinking.

Conclusion

Stockholm Syndrome is a defense mechanism, not real love. Understanding it helps us liberate ourselves from these psychological chains.

A Physically and Mentally Fragile Generation.. When Food Becomes a Threat!

On every street and in every mall, sweet shops have spread offering products full of sugar and hydrogenated oils. This problem is more evident during Ramadan with illogical amounts of sweets in terms of variety and price!

What is the problem?

  • Children have become addicted to this food, paying the price with obesity, early-onset diabetes, and weak immunity.
  • Increased rates of stunting due to the lack of proper nutrition.
  • Excessive sugar affects the brain, making children more irritable and hyperactive.

Why are Sugar and Hydrogenated Oils dangerous?

1. Weight Gain and Diabetes: They strain the pancreas and cause insulin resistance.
2. Behavioral Issues: Leading to hyperactivity and poor concentration.
3. Heart Disease: Hydrogenated oils raise bad cholesterol and cause inflammation.
4. Food Waste: Huge quantities are being served that exceed the needs of individuals and families.

What is the solution?

  • Strict Laws: Banning the marketing of harmful foods to children and monitoring ingredients.
  • Awareness Campaigns: In schools and media for parents and children.
  • Healthy Alternatives: Encouraging natural products and whole-grain baked goods.

Conclusion

Our children's health is not a luxury; it is a responsibility. Sugar and hydrogenated oils are a time bomb that could destroy the future of an entire generation. A serious stand is needed to protect the coming generations!

Lavender: The AI That Decides People's Fate Without Mercy!

Technology is evolving at a terrifying speed, and AI is now in everything around us, from phones to wars! But when AI turns into a tool that decides people's fates, we must stop and ask: where are the boundaries?

In a shocking report published by "The Guardian" in April 2024, it was revealed that the occupation entity developed an AI tool called "Lavender," whose job is to monitor conversations and identify who might be a "military target"!

How does "Lavender" work?

"Lavender" is an advanced military espionage tool developed by Intelligence Unit "8200," gathering massive data such as:

  • Phone calls and WhatsApp messages.
  • People's locations using phone signals.
  • Daily movement patterns and behavior.
Based on this, the algorithm decides who gets bombed! Reports state they accepted an error rate that kills 20 civilians for every one targeted person!

The Result? Thousands of Victims due to Robotic Decisions!

The concept turned into an "automated assassination factory," according to former intelligence officers. The result was thousands of deaths among women and children and the destruction of entire families' homes based on inaccurate algorithmic "probabilities."

The Future: AI or a Killing Machine?

When AI reaches a point where it becomes "judge and executioner" at the same time, the world must stand against using technology this way. "Lavender" will remain a symbol of the danger of using AI in life-and-death decisions.

Sources

The Guardian, Al Arabiya, Defense Arabia, Euronews Arabic (links provided in the Arabic version).

content.en:
Your Body's Magic Vacuum.. Only Works with Fasting!

Imagine if your body had a superpower to detoxify, repair damaged cells, and restart itself! This amazing feature actually exists and is called "Autophagy," discovered by Japanese scientist Yoshinori Ohsumi, who won the Nobel Prize in Medicine for it!

How does fasting activate this "Magic Vacuum"?

When you fast for 12-17 hours, your blood sugar level drops, and the body starts looking for alternative energy, activating Autophagy at full strength! The result? Your body gets rid of toxins and damaged cells, recycling their components as an energy source!

Amazing Benefits of Fasting and Autophagy:

  • Detoxifying the Body: During fasting, the liver works more efficiently and cells get rid of harmful wasteâ€¦ a 100% natural detox!
  • Reducing Inflammation and Boosting Immunity: Fasting helps reduce inflammation that causes diseases like heart disease, diabetes, and Alzheimer's, and regenerates immune cells.
  • Resisting Viruses and Bacteria: The autophagy mechanism helps the body strengthen the digestive system's immunity, which is the body's first line of defense!

During the COVID-19 pandemic, some studies suggested that stimulating autophagy might help reduce the environment suitable for viral growth, though it is not a direct cure.

The Conclusion?

We fast as an act of worship and obedience to God, but science confirms every day that fasting is not just a ritual; it's an amazing medical miracle! Fasting renews your body, protects you from diseases, and keeps you in better health!

Instagram Algorithms: The Secret Weapon That Decides Exactly What You See and What is Hidden!

- Imagine scrolling through Instagram and suddenly seeing a terrifying image or a video full of blood and violence! This is what happened a few days ago due to a glitch in Instagram's algorithms, which are supposed to protect you from such things.
- But what are these algorithms? How do they work? And why do they sometimes fail? Let's find out together simply.

What are Algorithms? In short, the smart brain behind the screen

- Think of algorithms as a "genius robot" living inside Instagram, whose job is to choose the photos and videos you see.
- It doesn't choose randomly; it's like a friend who knows what you like and dislike, watching every click, like, and even how long you spend looking at a video.

How do algorithms prevent violent content?

- Algorithms use "Artificial Intelligence" as a magic eye that looks at the image or video and understands it.
- If it sees blood or a weapon, it puts a red flag and hides it or places a warning over it.

The problem that occurred on February 27, 2025

- A glitch or breach affected the algorithms; instead of hiding violent content, terrifying videos appeared in "Reels," scaring people.
- "Meta" apologized quickly and said they contained the issue, but it made us ask: are these algorithms always right?

The Good Side: A shield protecting you from nightmares!

- Algorithms protect you from bloody scenes to keep you happy and prevent the spread of violence that could desensitize people over time.

The Bad Side: Are they controlling your mind?

- Sometimes they act like a strict manager deciding what you see based on company policies.
- For example, regarding the Palestinian cause; Meta sometimes deems it "inappropriate" and shows misleading news or hides the reality, while commercial products are shown to you every day!

Conclusion: The power of algorithms is in your hands!

- Algorithms are like a smart friend, but not always perfect.
- It's good that they protect you, but you must know they might choose what you see based on their own preferences. Use social media carefully and choose what you like yourselfâ€”don't let the robot decide everything for you!

Majorana1: The Magic That Will Change the Computer World with Microsoft!

- In an exciting and major move on Wednesday, February 19, 2025, Microsoft revealed the launch of the "Majorana1" chip, a new technology that could be a turning point in the world of quantum computing.
- This chip is not just an ordinary development; it holds amazing potential using a new state of matter, neither solid, liquid, nor gas, which makes it unique.

What is "Majorana1" and what does it do?

- Simply put, "Majorana1" is a quantum chip, a new type of technology that works on quantum computers.
- These computers are not like the ones we use every day; they can solve complex problems at incredible speeds.
- The secret of this chip is that it uses something strange called "Majorana particles," which allow the computer to operate with high efficiency without being affected by external factors that could disrupt it.

Why is this chip important?

- Imagine having a powerful tool that can help solve the world's greatest challenges! "Majorana1" could be the key to developing new drugs for diseases like cancer, improving environmental protection technologies, and even enhancing AI to be faster and smarter.

How did they achieve this?

- The Microsoft team used materials like special metals and placed them in extreme conditions â€“ intense cooling near absolute zero â€“ to create this new state of matter.
- The result was a strong and stable technology, giving "Majorana1" a significant competitive advantage.

What's next?

- This chip is still in its early stages, but if successful, we could see practical quantum computers on the market within a few years.
- Microsoft plans to scale up to a chip with millions of qubits (quantum computing units), opening new fields in industry and business.

Why this name?

- "Majorana" comes from the name of a brilliant Italian scientist, Ettore Majorana, who predicted the existence of these particles in the 1930s.
- Microsoft chose this name to honor him and his vision that has become a reality today.

In Conclusion

- "Majorana1" is not just a chip; it's the beginning of a new era in technology. Whether you work in tech, healthcare, or the environment, this achievement could directly affect your work in the future.

Quantum Computers: A Terrible Danger or a Key to a Better Future?

Imagine you have a difficult puzzle; a normal computer solves it step by step, but a Quantum Computer can solve all possible solutions at the same time!
This technology could change the world, but will it be for us or against us?

What are Quantum Computers?

- Normal computers operate with Bits (0 or 1), but Quantum Computers use Qubits, which can be 0 and 1 at the same time!
- This means they are much faster at solving complex problems.

The Danger: Is Quantum Computing a Threat to Us?

The biggest concern among scientists is Cybersecurity, as they can break passwords and data encryption in moments!
This could lead to:
- Hacking bank accounts and personal information.
- Exposing encrypted conversations and secret data of countries and companies.
- Threatening national security because all protection methods we currently rely on could become worthless.

Practical Example:

- Today, breaking RSA 2048-bit encryption that protects our data requires millions of years with a normal computer.
- But with Shorâ€™s Algorithm, a quantum computer could do it in minutes!
- Thatâ€™s why scientists are working on Post-Quantum Cryptography.

Edward Snowden: "Quantum computers could make all security systems worthless!"
Elon Musk: "This technology could be the greatest existential threat to humanity."

But can Quantum Computers help humanity?

Despite the fears, this technology could solve huge problems like:
1. Discovering new treatments: For incurable diseases like cancer and Alzheimer's.
2. Developing clean energy sources: Reducing pollution and providing cheap energy.
3. Improving AI: Meaning much smarter robots and applications.

Practical Example:

Currently, companies like Google and IBM use quantum computers to design new drugs much faster than traditional methods, because they can simulate chemical reactions that normal computers cannot.

Sundar Pichai (Google CEO): "Quantum computing will completely change the shape of the world."
Michio Kaku (Physicist): "It will open doors to understanding the universe and curing incurable diseases."

Conclusion: Useful Technology or Potential Disaster?

This technology is like a knife; you can use it in the kitchen or you can hurt someone with it!
- The problem isn't in quantum computers themselves, but in how we regulate their use.
If there are laws and regulations, they will be very beneficial. But if left uncontrolled, they could turn into a disaster!
We are on the verge of "Quantum Supremacy" that will change the world completely! But are we ready?

Supply and Demand Policy: Why Do Prices Rise and Fall?

Have you ever wondered why something was very expensive and then its price dropped after a while?
- It's all because of supply and demand! Let's understand the idea simply and easily.

What is Supply and Demand?

Everything in the world, whether it's a mobile phone, a car, tomatoes, or even a job, has a supply (the quantity provided) and a demand (the number of people who want it).
If something is in high demand and the available quantity is low, its price will increase.
If there is a lot of something in the market and people don't need it much, its price will decrease.

Example from the Egyptian Market: Tomatoes

- Last year, tomatoes were scarce in the market, and the price reached 50 EGP per kilo! Farmers saw this as a good profit opportunity, so this year they all planted a lot of tomatoes, expecting to sell them at a high price.
- But the opposite happened! Production was massive, and the market couldn't absorb the entire quantity, so the price of tomatoes dropped to only 3.5 EGP. Instead of profiting, farmers lost due to the surplus in supply over demand.

Another Example: How does this affect the labor market too?

- The same idea applies to the labor market.
- When a certain field becomes highly demanded, like programming or design, you find many people learning it. Initially, salaries are good, but when the number of people with the same skill becomes large, companies find plenty of labor, and salaries decrease.

Other Examples of Supply and Demand:

Mobile Phones: When the first new iPhone was released, its price was very high because demand was great. But after a while, when new models were released, the price dropped.
Apartments: If many people want to live in a certain area and apartments are scarce, prices rise. But if the supply increases, prices fall.

How to avoid these problems in your future?

- Think before entering a field of work just for the current opportunity, because not every field in demand now will be in demand in a few years.
- Be unique; don't be like everyone else. Learn additional skills that make you different.
- Follow the market; see which fields demand will increase in, not just what everyone is getting into.
- Plan for the future; what is profitable today won't necessarily stay that way tomorrow, so think long-term.

Conclusion

- Just as tomatoes became expensive and then cheap due to supply and demand, any field or product in the world is affected by the same rule.
- Therefore, you must think and plan before making any decision, whether in buying or working, so you don't find yourself in a difficult situation due to market changes!

content.en:
How Did China Become the World's Largest Trader?

- In 2000, America was the one trading with most countries more than anyone else.
- Countries everywhere were buying from and selling to it, and it controlled global trade.
- But now, the world has turned upside down, and China has taken the lead, becoming the most important trading partner for many countries.

How did this happen!

China Started from Below Zero and Reached the Top

- Formerly, China was a poor country, with most people working in agriculture.
- But in the late seventies, the Chinese government decided to open the country to investment and trade, and factories began spreading everywhere.
- Workers' wages there were low relative to the country's currency, making companies move their manufacturing to China to lower costs.
- Over time, China became the "Factory of the World," with almost everything being made there, from mobile phones to clothes and electrical appliances.
- As factories increased, exports grew, and China began taking America's place in trade.

China Knows How to Win Friends Easily

- China didn't just rely on factories; it also began building friendships with many countries through trade and investment. For example:
- It went to African countries and built roads, bridges, and hospitals in exchange for raw materials like gold and oil.
- It went to Latin America and invested in farms and factories.
- Even in Europe and Asia, China began expanding and making large trade agreements.
- Because of this, many countries now rely on China for trade more than America, placing it at the forefront.

Chinese Products are Cheap and Abundant

- One of the main reasons for China's success is its ability to manufacture anything at a very cheap price compared to other countries.
- If there is an American phone for $1000, China can make a similar one for $300! This made countries prefer buying from China instead of more expensive places.
- China doesn't just make cheap products; it has also started competing in quality, filling global markets with its goods.

Chinese Technology Dominates the World

- At first, China copied foreign products using reverse engineering, but now it innovates its own products, especially in technology. For example:
- Chinese companies like Huawei and Xiaomi are competing with Apple and Samsung in smartphones.
- China has become a leader in 5G technology and holds many more patents than America.
- Chinese electric cars have started competing with Tesla in global markets.
- This means China doesn't just sell traditional products; it leads technological development in the world.

Did America Just Leave Things This Way?

- Of course not! America sees that China has taken its place in trade, and it doesn't like it at all.
- Therefore, America began fighting China economically, imposing high tariffs, reducing dealings with Chinese companies, and trying to convince other countries to rely on it instead of China.
- Despite all this, China still maintains its position and is trying to expand further into new markets.

Conclusion: Will China Remain Superior?

China managed in just 20 years to take America's place in global trade, thanks to massive factories, cheap prices, and smart investments in many countries.
But will China stay superior forever? Or could America regain control?
No one can answer this question now, but what we are sure of is that the competition between China and America will continue, with each country trying to be the strongest in the world.

A New Player Grok 3: Elon Musk is Changing the AI Game Rules!

- In a new step for the future, Elon Musk and his company xAI announced the launch of the advanced Grok 3 model, expected to be a real revolution in the world of AI.
- This announcement is not just a regular update; it's a turning point in how AI interacts with humans!

What distinguishes Grok 3?

- Unlike traditional models, Grok 3 has an unprecedented ability to understand images, analyze data, and provide smart, deep responses.
- Musk described it as the "smartest on Earth," making it a strong competitor to platforms like ChatGPT and DeepSeek.
- The main goal? Making AI more open and interactive!

The Computing Power Behind Grok 3

- To ensure stunning performance, xAI is investing heavily in super-hardware.
- The company announced Colossus, the world's most powerful supercomputer, equipped with 100,000 NVIDIA H100 GPUs, with plans to double it to 200,000 units soon.
- This means massive capacity to train AI models with unprecedented speed and accuracy!

xAI is also entering the field of smart robotics!

Musk's ambitions didn't stop at AI only; the company announced the construction of a massive facility in Memphis to develop smart robots, reflecting his desire to dominate the future of smart technology.

A Multi-Billion Dollar Deal to Enhance AI

To boost Grok 3's capabilities, xAI signed a massive $5 billion deal with Dell Technologies to supply servers with NVIDIA GB200 processors, enhancing the model's ability to handle data with unprecedented speed and efficiency.

New Features Changing Search Rules

- One of the powerful additions is the DeepSearch feature, allowing deep searching across the internet and X (formerly Twitter), providing accurate analyses and advanced summaries.
- Additionally, voice interaction support is coming soon, allowing users to communicate with Grok 3 directly via voice!

Grok 3 Subscription Plans

xAI provides multiple options for users:
- Grok 3 Reasoning: Ideal for deep reasoning and solving problems with advanced intelligence.
- Grok 3 Mini Reasoning: A smaller version at a lower cost.
- SuperGrok: For a $30 monthly or $300 annual subscription, it offers unlimited search queries and advanced image generation.

Can Grok 3 Compete with AI Giants?

- With all these innovations, it seems Grok 3 will pose a real challenge to the big players in the field.
But the most important question: Will it succeed in achieving Elon Musk's vision for advanced AI?
Will Grok 3 be the start of a new era in AI? No one can answer that question right now.

Beware of SMS Messages Even if They Look Trustworthy!

We used to be happy when we received a message on our phones, but now we must be careful! Why?
- Because people use SMS messages to steal your data or deceive you.
- Recently, messages containing links like the following have spread:
orangslg top
egyshwa top
- And other things similar to Egyptian Post messages; they are almost all from the same source, but they change the wording and domain to trap you.
They try to convince you that a package is coming, but the truth is these are all phishing attempts to trick you into entering your bank card number!
- Beware and never enter your data.
Let's see how they do this and how to protect yourself.

Impersonation

- Imagine receiving an SMS from "The Bank" or a "known company" saying: "There is a problem with your account, send us your details quickly!" It looks official, but it's a trap!
- Scammers use names of well-known companies to make you believe them and give them your information.
- Do not respond; call the bank yourself if you are in doubt.

Malicious Links

- Like "Click here to receive your free gift" or "Enter the link to update your account."
- But the truth is, if you click, you might be spied on using malware that steals your photos and data, or even opens the camera and microphone without you noticing!

Intimidation, Scaring, and Urgency

- For example, "Your account will be closed within 24 hours if you don't enter the link!"
- Naturally, you get stressed and rush to click the link, but that's exactly what is wanted from you!
- Hackers rely on fear and urgency so you make a quick decision without thinking.
- Stay calm and ask yourself: "Am I sure this message is real?"

Phishing

- Like "We need to confirm your details, send your card number and password so your account isn't closed." This is one of the most famous tricks!
- Any message asking for your personal or banking details is usually a scam attempt.
- Verify for yourself before interacting with any message.

How to protect yourself?

- Verify the source: If the message is from a bank or company, call them yourself on the official number, not the one in the message.
- Do not click on any links even if they look reliable; open the official website from Google instead of clicking the link.
- Use protection programs: Have an antivirus to protect you from malware.
- Do not share your data with anyone via messages or calls; the bank will never ask for your data like this.
- There are many sites for free link scanning; if you search on Google or ask ChatGPT, it will give you good options. Put the link in, it will be scanned, and the site will tell you if it is malicious or safe.
- These are some tools you can use to check links:
virustotal
urlvoid
checkphish
phishtank

Conclusion:

- Not every message you receive is real, and scammers play on the speed of your reaction.
- Take a deep breath, think, and verify before you act! Caution is your first weapon against electronic fraud!

Recent Developments on Displacement: Egypt Sets the Record Straight

In recent days, there have been major developments regarding the issue of Palestinian displacement from Gaza. The matter took a dangerous turn after U.S. President Trump's statements suggesting he might cut aid to Egypt and Jordan if they do not agree to host displaced Palestinians.

Egypt Responds Clearly: No Displacement... The Decision is Final

Egypt didn't wait long and officially responded to Washington with its final decision:
- No displacement of Palestinians under any circumstances.
- The matter is not up for discussion at all.

Concurrently with the official response, Egyptian sources told Al-Arabiya channel:
- Egypt has emergency plans ready for any U.S. pressure and has prepared precautionary measures for any potential suspension of aid.

Sisi Postpones U.S. Visit and Sets a Clear Condition

- Amidst this escalation, President Abdel Fattah el-Sisi decided to postpone his visit to America indefinitely. This decision is seen as a very strong political message, especially given its timing.
- More importantly, Egyptian sources told Reuters that Sisi will not travel as long as the meeting's agenda includes any talk of Palestinian displacement or emptying Gaza. The message here is clear: Egypt will not participate in any discussion that harms Palestinian rights or threatens their presence on their land.
- Meanwhile, the U.S. Embassy in Cairo tried to calm the atmosphere, stating that the relationship between Egypt and the U.S. is "essential and special," but escalation on the ground continues.

U.S. Aid to Egypt... Could it Stop?

Regarding U.S. aid, it's important to know it's part of the peace treaty with Israel, and most of it is military aid, not food or medicine.
- This means stopping it won't be an easy decision, as it would affect the balances of the entire region and would be a violation of the peace treaty.

Egypt Warns: Peace is at Risk

- With the escalating situation, Egypt directly warned that what is happening threatens the foundations of peace that have lasted for decades. This is a clear warning that any change in the equation will have major consequences.
Additionally, Israel complained about Egyptian military presence in Sinai, especially the large deployment near the Gaza borders.
- However, the Egyptian response was very strong through a massive security display of police and counter-terrorism forces at the borders, with a message: Egypt is ready and prepared for any scenario.

Trump Announces: No Return for the Displaced... Egypt Completely Rejects

- A dangerous statement came from Trump, saying those who leave Gaza will have no right of return.
But Egypt responded firmly:
- No exit for any Palestinians from Gaza.
- Whoever left for any reason must return immediately.
- Egypt officially warned Israel against placing any obstacles to the return of patients receiving treatment abroad.

"Buying Gaza"... A New American Plan?

- Another strange statement came from Trump, saying there is a plan in preparation to buy and rebuild Gaza, but without the Palestinians!
- Egypt responded practically, demanding a clear timetable from Israel for the entry of Egyptian equipment for Gaza's reconstruction, confirming that Egypt isn't just saying no to displacement, but is also working on rebuilding the strip.

Netanyahu Attacks... Egypt Responds

- On the other hand, Netanyahu made a statement saying Egypt is the reason Palestinians cannot leave, turning Gaza into a large prison.
- But the Egyptian response was very strong:
- These accusations are lies, misleading, and completely rejected.
- The people of Gaza are brave, and Egypt is with them until the last breath.

Intense Diplomatic Movements

Amidst the escalation, the Egyptian Foreign Minister was in America.
- While he was there, an official statement was issued from Cairo in sharp language, emphasizing:
- The Palestinian people's right to self-determination and the establishment of their independent state.
- Any attempt to change the current situation threatens the stability of the entire region.
- Egypt will not accept any solutions at the expense of Palestinians.
In another diplomatic move, Egypt began coordinating with Arab countries to form a unified Arab position, emphasizing:
- Palestine belongs to its people.
- The land is theirs, the state is their right, and it is not for sale.

Raising Military Readiness... and Securing Strategic Needs

With all these developments, the Egyptian Minister of Defense
- Directed the army to maintain the highest levels of combat readiness for any emergencies.
At the same time, the Prime Minister confirmed the provision of strategic goods in large quantities and contracting for massive batches in preparation for any potential scenario.

The Message is Clear: Egypt Will Not Compromise

In the end, the Egyptian position is firm and categorical:
- No displacement of Palestinians.
- No one will concede Palestinian rights.
- Egypt will not participate in any meeting proposing displacement and will not participate in any injustice against Palestinians.
- Pressure will not change Egypt's position, whatever the cost.
All you have to do now is follow what's happening and trust your country's institutions, because Egypt is managing this file with wisdom and firmness at the same time.

"The Satanic Map: Is There a Plan to Divide Our Nations?"

Starting with the man who wanted to fragment our nations

- He is Bernard Lewis, an old man but very skilled in studying history, knowing a lot about Arabs and Muslims.
The problem was that Bernard did not like Arabs, and he planned something very dangerous, akin to a "Satanic Map," with the idea of destroying our nations and dividing them into small and weak mini-states!

Satanic Map: How did the plot begin?

- Once, Arab and Islamic nations were strong and large, which was very worrying for some Western countries wanting to keep global control.
- Bernard Lewis had a terrifying idea: every large Arab and Islamic nation must be divided into small parts to stay weak and unable to defend itself!
- It is said that in 1983, Bernard Lewis proposed his plan to America, telling them:
"If you want the Middle East to stay weak, we must divide it into small warring states!"
"Keep them always in conflicts, so they don't have time to build themselves or stand against us!"

What exactly is the Satanic Map?

- This plan was very smart but evil, as they decided to use people's problems against them!
For example:
- If a country has Muslims and Christians, make each side hate the other.
- If a country has different tribes, ignite problems between them.
- If a country has Arabs and Kurds, make Kurds demand separation.
- Thus, instead of people being united, everyone will start fighting the other!

Targeted countries in the Satanic Map

Bernard Lewis wanted to divide many countries, including:
Iraq â€“ dividing it into 3 states:
- A Kurdish state in the north
- A Sunni Arab state in the middle
- A Shia state in the south
Syria â€“ turning into 4 states:
- An Alawite state
- A Kurdish state
- A Sunni state
- A Druze state
Saudi Arabia â€“ dividing into 3 states:
- A state for the sanctuaries (Mecca and Medina)
- A Shia state in the east
- A tribal state in the center
Egypt â€“ To:
- A Christian state in the south
- Separating Nubia
- Keeping Muslims in the north.
Libya â€“ dividing into 3 parts:
- Cyrenaica
- Tripoli
- Fezzan
Sudan â€“ To
- And this actually happened in 2011 when South Sudan separated from the north!

Is the plot real or just talk?

- There is no official document saying America followed Bernard Lewis's plan literally -(no one does something illegal and writes contracts for it) - but looking around us, we find what he talked about actually started happening!
For example:
- Iraq entered sectarian wars after 2003.
- Syria had a civil war with every group wanting to rule alone.
- Libya after the revolution became full of armed groups, each wanting to rule a piece.
- Sudan was actually divided into two states.
- All this makes us ask ourselves:
"Is this just a coincidence? Or did someone plan all this?"
The answer is certainly No (current events about Palestinian displacement are the best evidence)
And here we reach the important question: Does Israel have a role in the Satanic Map?
- This plan definitely helps Israel, because as long as Arab nations are weak and divided, no one can face Israel or face the Greater Israel plan!
- There is another document called the "Oded Yinon Plan," appearing in 1982, stating the same idea: "Israel must keep Arabs divided to stay strong!"

How to protect our countries from the Satanic Map?

The only solution is to be united and not let anyone divide us whether in terms of religion, sect, or race!
Most importantly, we need to do very important things, like:
- Stop believing anyone who tries to divide us because of religion, race, or tribe.
- Focus on science and progress to be truly strong.
- Help each other instead of fighting each other.
- Understand that anyone igniting sedition aims to weaken us!

Conclusion

This map will succeed if we allow it to succeed! But as long as we are united and know we are one people, it will never be realized!
The future is in our hands, and if we stay strong, no one can divide our countries!

Warning! Even Apple Devices Aren't as Secure as You Thought! (Part 2)

Safe Apps Trick in Apple!

Many have an idea that Apple apps are 100% secure with no problems! But the truth is totally different! A large security company called "Kaspersky" discovered apps on the Apple store with malicious programs spying on people!

How is spying done?

- Imagine opening a chat or food delivery app, and suddenly the app asks for photo gallery permission!
- Naturally, you might think it's a normal request, but the truth is these apps use smart technology reading texts in images
- If you have passwords or secret codes in the images, the app sends them to hackers!

Apps turned out to be dangerous!

These are some apps discovered to be spying:
WeTink â€“ a smart chat app
AnyGPT â€“ an AI app
ComeCome â€“ a food delivery app
The strangest thing is Apple and Google until now haven't said anything about the matter!

So how to protect yourself?

You must be cautious and protect your data, and these are some steps to help you:
Delete suspicious apps â€“ if you have any of these apps or any strange app, delete it immediately!
Update your device and apps â€“ your system must always be updated to get the latest antivirus protections
Review permissions â€“ before giving any app permission to access photos or any data, think: "Why does the app need this?"
Use trusted security apps â€“ there are programs protecting your device from viruses and hacking, like antivirus programs
Monitor your financial accounts â€“ if you feel any strange activity in your accounts, report to the bank immediately!

Conclusion

Not any app on the Apple Store is safe! You must always be smart and cautious and keep your information.

USA and China.. The Great Technology Race! (Part 2)

America is Afraid of Chinese AI!

- Imagine you're in a big contest, and one of your colleagues becomes very skilled and wins the first prize, but instead of trying to be better, you decide to ban them from playing with you!
- This is exactly what America is trying to do with China in the field of AI.
- There is a new law America is trying to implement, stating that anyone in America cannot deal with Chinese AI in any way, even if just downloading it for study!
- If someone violates this law, they could pay a huge fine or even go to prison!

What does this mean?

- If someone in America decides to use Chinese AI, they could be severely punished.
- If an American company tries to invest in a Chinese company specialized in AI, it is strictly forbidden.
- Even scientists and researchers in America cannot collaborate with Chinese universities on AI research.

What's the problem?

- The problem is that this law will not only harm China but will harm America itself and the world more!
- Because it will make accessing technology very difficult, making AI available only to the wealthy and big companies, reducing opportunities for ordinary people and small businesses.
- Also, smart scientists coming from China to work in America might decide to leave the country, making America lose very important minds.
- Or it might make the world lose massive minds to American monopoly.
- Ultimately, instead of stopping China, China will become stronger and lead more in the tech race!

The Conclusion:

Instead of America trying to develop itself and compete fairly with China, it's trying to prevent competition entirely. This won't stop China's progress, but it will cause America and the world to lag further behind!

USA and China.. The Great Technology Race!

- Imagine you're racing a friend, and each of you wants to win by any means!
- That's exactly what's happening between the USA and China, but their race isn't in running; it's in technology, especially AI!

Why are they fighting?

- Initially, the problem appeared to be about "taxes and customs."
- Meaning when a country buys products from another, they must pay extra money.
- U.S. President Trump decided to make Chinese products more expensive by imposing 10% tariffs.
- The reason cited by Trump was that China doesn't prevent "Fentanyl" smuggling, a dangerous drug causing major problems in the US.
- China was upset and responded quickly! It decided to impose tariffs between 10% and 15% on American products such as:
Oil
Agricultural machinery
Large cars
Pickup trucks
Coal and natural gas
- But the truth is, the big fight isn't over money; that's just the surface. It's about who will control future technology!

The Real Conflict: Artificial Intelligence!

- Both America and China want to be number one because the winner will have massive power in the future!
- China has powerful companies like "Huawei" and "Alibaba," developing smart devices and systems that learn quickly and solve problems without human intervention!
- Moreover, the Chinese government assists these companies with massive amounts of data for faster development.
- America has massive companies like "Google," "Microsoft," and "OpenAI," creating highly advanced AI.
- But the problem is America's fear that China will steal this technology for its benefit, leading to the ban on American companies selling AI tech to China!

Even More Dangerous: AI and the Military!

- The most dangerous part is that both nations use AI in the military!
- China: Has smart cameras monitoring people, identifying anyone on the street via facial recognition!
- America: Developing smart drones and defense systems that act rapidly against any threat!

China's Reaction Against America!

When America imposed tariffs, China didn't stay silent and responded with 3 strong decisions:
1. Imposed tariffs on key American products starting February 10.
2. Launched an investigation into "Google" for monopoly, meaning Google prevents others from competing unfairly!
3. Placed restrictions on exporting rare minerals used in tech and clean energy manufacturing, which the whole world needs!

Who will win?

- The war is still at its beginning. Whichever country develops stronger and smarter AI will hold global economic and military power!
- We can consider the path just starting, so everyone is still energetic and fighting for the chance.

Beware of Fake Voice Recordings!

First, what is a fabricated voice recording?

  • A fabricated voice recording sounds real but is made using AI, meaning someone can take your voice from an old recording and make it say things you never said!
  • This is dangerous because it can get you into trouble or make people believe false things about you.

Has this actually happened?

Two families were on the verge of a major conflict due to fake voice recordings; someone used this technology to make it sound like two individuals were insulting each other! The voice was very realistic, and many believed it. However, someone became suspicious and decided to verify before reacting, seeking a way to detect the forgery.

How was the forgery discovered?

This person used online tools to verify the recordings. At first, they tried free sites, but nothing could determine the truth. Later, they used a paid tool costing $13 and finally discovered the recording was 98.87% fake! It was all lies and fabrication.

Imagine if this person hadn't been smart enough to verify? A disaster could have occurred! That's why we must not believe any voice recording without verification.

How can someone forge a voice?

Nowadays, software can mimic any voice with great precision, to the point where you might not distinguish it from the real voice! The software takes old recordings of a person's voice and then synthesizes new words and sentences as if the person said them.

While this technology can be used for goodâ€”like movie dubbing or helping people who lost their voicesâ€”it is unfortunately used for evil purposes like spreading lies, defamation, and blackmail (especially against girls).

How do we detect fake recordings?

To know if a recording is real or fake, there are specialized voice analysis tools, such as:

  • AI Voice Detector: Analyzes the voice to see if it's real or AI-generated.
  • AI Speech Detector: Can detect forgery even if the audio has been modified with noise or effects.
  • Deepfake Voice Detection: Looks for unnatural anomalies in the sound indicating it's fabricated.

How to protect ourselves?

To avoid falling into the trap, keep the following in mind:

  1. Don't believe any voice recording immediately! Ask yourself: "Does this make sense?" If you doubt it, use detection tools.
  2. If someone tries to blackmail you or tarnish your reputation with a fake recording, report it to an adult or the authorities immediately.
  3. Learn more about this technology and tell your family and friends so they don't get deceived.
  4. Be careful with your voice recordings and don't send them to untrusted individuals.

In the end, technology is a double-edged sword

AI is useful if used correctly, but it can be a dangerous weapon in the wrong hands. Think before you judge, because not everything we hear is necessarily true! âš ï¸

content.en:
Warning! Even Apple Devices Aren't as Secure as You Thought!

Have you ever thought that Apple's powerful devices could have vulnerabilities allowing hackers to steal your information? It actually happened! Researchers at the Georgia Institute of Technology and a German university discovered two serious vulnerabilities in Apple M-Series processors that could allow hackers to access sensitive data, such as websites you visit, emails, and even bank card information!

How does this breach happen?

  • The issue is related to "Speculative Execution" in modern processorsâ€”a method the processor uses to work faster by predicting and executing upcoming steps before being 100% sure they are correct.
  • The problem is that if the prediction is wrong, secret information is leaked, which hackers exploit!

The Two Critical Vulnerabilities: SLAP and FLOP

First, SLAP: Affects M2, A15 processors, and later. It targets the "Load Address Predictor," which tries to predict data locations in memory. If the prediction fails, hackers can access data like browsing history and emails from browsers like Safari.

Second, FLOP: Affects M3, M4, and A17 processors. It targets the "Load Value Predictor," which predicts data values before retrieval. If the prediction fails, it allows hackers to bypass protection and steal sensitive info like geographic location, calendar events, and bank card data!

Does Apple know?

Yes, Apple was notified of these vulnerabilities between May and September 2024, but the company is still studying their impact and working on fixes. This isn't the first time such leaks have occurred; in November 2024, researchers from Korea University discovered another attack called "SysBumps" that breaks macOS security, along with a new attack named "TagBleed."

What is the solution? Is Apple unsafe?

The truth is, no device in the world is 100% secure! Big companies like Apple constantly try to protect users, but hackers always race against time to find new gaps. Therefore, always keep your device updated and be cautious of the sites and programs you use.

A Future Story Inspired by AI Imagination (Deepseek, ChatGPT)

I will try to simplify the story in my own way so it's understandable for everyone, as the input from both was very dense and complex ğŸ¤–

A tale about the future and AI: Let's say AI is like a smart toy that can do very useful things.

First Period (2025-2045): AI Assists Everywhere

  • Initially, robots and AI will handle simple tasks like self-driving cars and assisting doctors in hospitals to treat patients.
  • In schools, robots might help children study in ways that suit them best.
  • Impact on Humans: Our lives will be easier, but people with simple jobs might struggle as robots take over their tasks.

Second Period (2045-2065): AI Becomes Very Intelligent

  • Soon, robots will mimic human thinking, writing stories, and composing songs.
  • There might be small chips implanted in the human brain to allow faster thinking and more knowledge.
  • Robots will also help build homes on planets like Mars.
  • Impact on Humans: People will become stronger and smarter, but we must agree on rules so robots don't become dangerous.

Third Period (2065-2085): Robots Become Extremely Powerful

  • AI will become stronger and smarter than humans.
  • It will find cures for all difficult diseases and extend human lifespan.
  • It will also work on cleaning the planet from pollution.
  • Impact on Humans: People will live longer, but they will worry about AI potentially taking control of everything.

Fourth Period (2085-2105): Humans and Robots

  • There will be humanoid robots, and some people might become half-human, half-robot (cyborgs).
  • People will live in virtual worlds, like a massive game where they can do anything.
  • Impact on Humans: Life will be very different; even family relationships might change.

Fifth Period (2105-2125): A New World

  • AI will become autonomous, needing no human instruction or guidance.
  • Some may live traditional lives, while others merge with AI to become entirely different.
  • Impact on Humans: Humanity will split into two types: natural humans and those integrated with AI.

Summary of the Story

  • The future will be full of surprises that make our lives better and easier, but we must set rules and think carefully so robots don't pose a threat to humanity.

content.en:
Amid the Deepseek and ChatGPT Rivalry, a New Player Emerges

Launching Qwen2.5-Max: The AI that will be the talk of the world!

  • China's Alibaba Group has announced its latest model, Qwen2.5-Max. This isn't just an ordinary AI model; it's highly advanced and claimed to outperform other models like Deepseek.
  • What does this mean? It means China is working to compete with global giants like OpenAI and Google.

What exactly is Qwen?

  • The Qwen model is a series of AI models developed by Alibaba Cloud.
  • It is a unique model because it can analyze text, generate new content, translate languages, and much more.
  • If you have a long text or need to understand a specific topic, this will be one of the best options according to their claims.

Advantages of Qwen2.5-Max

This new version, Qwen2.5-Max, is supposed to be a highly advanced version over its predecessor.

  • It has been optimized to be faster and more accurate in data processing. Key features include:
  • Long-text analysis: Perfect for academic research and technical fields.
  • Improved logical reasoning and interaction: Conversations will be smarter and more human-like.
  • Reports suggest it is better than other models like Deepseek, making it a strong global competitor.

Are the versions open-source?

While Qwen2.5-Max itself is not fully open-source, Alibaba has released open-source versions such as:

  1. Qwen2.5-7B-Instruct-1M
  2. Qwen2.5-14B-Instruct-1M
  • What's special about these versions is that they allow for extremely long input of up to 1 million tokens, meaning you can input an entire book or a large collection of books for unprecedented smart analysis.

How can you try Qwen2.5?

Alibaba has allowed users to try the model through a special platform at this link: chat.qwenlm.ai

For more details about the model, you can visit their official blog: qwen2.5-blog.com

The Future of Artificial Intelligence

(The next post will be about AI's own perspective on this matter)

  • The launch of Qwen2.5-Max is a significant step in the AI race, as China strengthens its position in the field.
  • This model is expected to play a major role in various sectors like education, scientific research, and data analysis.
  • It could potentially change the future of technology globally.

Will Qwen2.5 overcome Western models like GPT-4 and Gemini? Or even Chinese ones like Deepseek? We will find out in the coming months or days through public testing regarding speed, reasoning, and accuracy.

Ultimately, AI has become an essential part of our daily lives, but letâ€™s hope its use remains within permissible limits.

The Future of Digital Privacy Amid Advancing Spyware: Solutions and Challenges (Part 3)

Evolution of Spyware: Becoming More Complex

Spyware today has become significantly more advanced, such as the "Pegasus" program (which we discussed in Part 1).

Artificial Intelligence and Future Spying

AI in Spying: Currently, AI helps spyware analyze massive amounts of data at high speeds, making it easier for attackers to identify their victims with greater precision.

Using AI for Malicious Purposes: Technologies like Deep Learning are now being used to bypass biometric systems (fingerprint and face recognition), meaning your fingerprints or facial data could be compromised.

Simultaneously, AI contributes to protection: Tools now utilize AI to detect attacks before they occur, such as Intrusion Detection Systems (IDS).

New Technologies and Their Role in Protection

  • Blockchain: This technology decentralizes data, meaning it is not stored in a single location, making it difficult for attackers to modify or steal.
  • A report from the World Economic Forum confirms that Blockchain is one of the strongest solutions against digital crimes.
  • Quantum Encryption: A new technology in the encryption world that offers unbreakable keys, which will revolutionize data security in the future.

Efforts of Governments and International Organizations

International Laws: The European Union implemented laws like the GDPR to protect individuals' data.

International Cooperation: The Budapest Convention helps countries collaborate in combating cybercrimes.

United Nations: Working on plans to protect developing nations from digital attacks.

Cybersecurity in Egypt

Egypt has recently begun prioritizing cybersecurity significantly to face the increasing digital threats.

  • Initiatives like "Digital Egypt" aim to improve digital services.
  • The "Anti-Information Technology Crimes Law," issued in 2018, aims to criminalize electronic breaches and protect data.
  • Training and Awareness: Egyptian universities and the Ministry of Communications now offer specialized programs in cybersecurity.

Tips to Protect Your Privacy

  • Always enable continuous updates for your devices and applications.
  • Use software that relies on strong encryption to protect your data.
  • If possible, use programs to detect attacks before they happen.
  • Maintain constant awareness of the latest threats and prevention methods.
  • Consider using Blockchain to secure your personal data.

The Bottom Line

Digital privacy is currently at risk due to the evolution of spying techniques, but technologies like AI and Blockchain offer robust solutions to face these threats. In Egypt, there are significant government efforts to improve digital security and provide a safe environment for individuals and institutions. With this awareness and these improvements, we can successfully overcome these challenges.

The Ability of Malware and Intelligence to Access Encrypted Messages: The Truth Behind Encryption (Part 2)

In the age of technology and communications, privacy has become vital for everyone, especially when using apps like WhatsApp, which claims to protect our data with "end-to-end encryption."

But is it truly enough? And are there vulnerabilities that could lead to a privacy breach?

First, what is "End-to-End Encryption"?

Mark Zuckerberg, CEO of Meta (parent company of WhatsApp), clarified that end-to-end encryption means no oneâ€”not even the company itselfâ€”can view the content of messages as they travel between people.

Essentially, the message is like a locked box that only the sender and receiver can open. However, the problem is that this does not guarantee the protection of data stored on your phone itself.

So, where is the problem? Devices and Malware

Mark also stated that if any party manages to access your phone (such as authorities or hackers), messages can be opened normally. This happens through dangerous spyware like "Pegasus" (which we discussed in Part 1).

Briefly, "Pegasus" is spyware developed by the NSO Group, which works by infiltrating phones to collect everything on them, including messages, photos, and even calls. This happens without needing to open a message or a link. In 2019, Meta filed a lawsuit against this company for using "Pegasus" to hack the phones of 1400 individuals, including journalists, activists, politicians, and dissidents.

How can you protect yourself?

If you want to maintain your privacy, there are simple steps you must take:

  • Update your apps and phone constantly: To close any vulnerabilities that could lead to a device breach.
  • Use only trusted applications: Be cautious of strange apps that might be malware.
  • Use strong passwords: And enable two-step verification to increase security.
  • Enable backup encryption: In WhatsApp, if you use it.

The Bottom Line

Despite all the advancements in the field of encryption, privacy remains threatened due to spyware and device vulnerabilities. Therefore, protecting your data is not just the responsibility of companies, but also your responsibility to take the right steps.

What is WiFi Calling Service? Simply Explained

Imagine you want to call your friend, but the cellular network is weak. WiFi Calling allows you to use your Wi-Fi connection to complete the call instead of relying on a mobile network that sometimes doesn't work well.

What's the Difference Between WiFi Calling and Regular Calls?

How does it work?

  • Regular calls depend on the network (like 2G, 3G, or 4G) and require a nearby cell tower.
  • WiFi Calling relies on Wi-Fi instead of the cellular network.

How is it affected during operation?

  • Regular calls won't work if the signal is weak.
  • WiFi Calling works if the Wi-Fi is relatively strongâ€”not necessarily extraordinaryâ€”even if there is no cellular signal at all.

In terms of quality:

  • Regular calls can have poor audio quality if the network is bad, if you are moving a lot, or if you are in a Dead Zone.
  • WiFi Calling audio is clearer because the internet is sometimes stable.

During travel:

  • Regular calls are very expensive abroad because they are treated as Roaming calls.
  • WiFi Calling is cheaper and sometimes free if you have Wi-Fi (depending on the country).

What are the Benefits?

  • Audio is clearer because the call remains crisp even if the mobile signal is weak.
  • Ease of use: It works anywhere there is Wi-Fi; if there's no mobile signal, Wi-Fi has you covered.
  • It is cost-effective when traveling abroad, saving you money by calling over Wi-Fi (but you must check the price of WiFi Calling in that specific country first as it varies).
  • Regarding power consumption, the battery lasts longer because the phone doesn't exert effort searching for a mobile network. In traditional calls, the phone searches for the nearest tower and sends signals over long distances compared to home Wi-Fi, which requires high battery power. For proof, watch your battery consumption while using mobile data versus using Wi-Fi.

How to Enable It?

  • First, ensure your phone supports WiFi Calling.
  • You can call your telecommunications provider to help or confirm that it is officially supported.
  • Enable it in your mobile settings:
    • On iPhone: Open Settings, select Phone, and enable WiFi Calling.
    • On Android: Open Settings, go to Networks, and enable WiFi Calling. (Note that these steps may vary from one phone to another and across different user interfaces).

Important Things to Know

  • There must be a relatively strong Wi-Fi connection (not necessarily extraordinary).
  • Most modern phones support this service; it's not new, as some countries began implementing it in 2007.

From an economic standpoint, this reduces the need for building new mobile towers and eliminates friction with people regarding misconceptions that these towers cause health problems or pose risks to residents.

In short, it is a double benefit: for the state by saving on tower construction, and for the citizen if the network is weak, or if you want to save battery or are traveling. WiFi Calling will be your best solution.

content.en:
Spyware and Pegasus: A New Threat to Our Digital Privacy (Part 1)

In the age of technology we live in today, our online privacy is more threatened than ever, especially due to something called spyware.

What are these programs?

These programs enter electronic devices without the user's knowledge, aiming to collect personal information or monitor everything done on the device. Some are simple tracking tools, while others like 'Pegasus' can control the entire device.

What is the Pegasus program?

'Pegasus' is one of the most dangerous and famous spyware programs to date, developed by the NSO Group. This program can infect Android and iPhone devices without needing a link click, using what are known as 'Zero-click exploits.'

Once infected, Pegasus can view your messages, record calls, open the camera or microphone without your knowledge, and even track your location.

What are the dangerous uses of Pegasus?

Although the developing company claims it's meant to help governments fight terrorism and crime, many reports indicate it has been used against ordinary people like journalists, human rights activists, and lawyers.

In 2021, a global investigation called 'The Pegasus Project' revealed that over 50,000 phone numbers were targeted by this program, including politicians and dissidents.

How is the world responding to this threat?

When this information surfaced, many countries criticized the program. The European Union, for example, called for a ban, and the U.S. blacklisted the NSO Group to limit American companies' dealings with them.

However, spyware continues to evolve and pose a significant threat.

Are these threats still ongoing?

In 2023, the Canadian laboratory 'Citizen Lab' uncovered a new spyware similar to Pegasus, used to monitor journalists and politicians in over 10 countries. This means the danger persists and is even growing.

How can we protect ourselves?

  • Constantly update your mobile security patches to close vulnerabilities.
  • Use only trusted applications and be wary of suspicious links.
  • Enable two-step verification to make device hacking more difficult.

The Bottom Line

Spyware like 'Pegasus' has become a real danger to our privacy and rights in the digital age. To protect ourselves, we must remain aware of these challenges and secure our devices as much as possible. Governments must also take action to prevent the illegal use of these programs.

Who are the Musta'ribeen?

The Musta'ribeen are individuals who are not Arabs by origin but present themselves online as part of Arab culture, using fake accounts and photos to incite discord.

Their goals:

  • Stir sensitive topics about religion, nationalism, and politics.
  • Spread false news and fabricated images.
  • Exploit emotions using fake videos or stories.
  • Pretend to be religious to create sectarian strife.

The harms:

  • Increase hatred among Arabs.
  • Mislead people and make them doubt credible information.
  • Expand sectarian conflict.

How to protect yourself:

  • Verify new or suspicious accounts.
  • Check news from trustworthy sources.
  • Avoid time-wasting discussions.
  • Report suspicious content on social media platforms.

The Musta'ribeen use technology to sow discord among peoples; Part 2 will discuss the future of these characters.

ğŸ“¶ Wi-Fi: A Hidden Tool for Monitoring Human Movement Indoors (Part 3 â€“ Final)

While the previous parts highlighted powerful benefits, this final section focuses on challenges and concerns.

Privacy

The biggest concern is privacy. If such technology is used without consent or regulation, it can easily become a surveillance tool. Strict laws are required to regulate its usage.

Accuracy Limitations

Like any emerging technology, Wi-Fi sensing is not 100% accurate. Factors such as room size, number of people, and large objects can affect signal analysis.

Future Adoption

Leading institutions like Carnegie Mellon University and MIT are actively researching Wi-Fi and RF-based sensing, including 3D human motion tracking and through-wall detection.

Conclusion

Wi-Fi sensing has the potential to revolutionize security, healthcare, and smart homes. However, without strong regulations and ethical boundaries, it also poses serious privacy risks.

ğŸ“¶ Smart Monitoring: How Wi-Fi Is Used to Track and Protect People Indoors (Part 2)

In the previous post (Part 1), we discussed how Wi-Fi technology can be used for purposes such as surveillance. In this part, we explore the details further.

New technologies have emerged that rely on Wi-Fi signals not only to provide internet access but also to monitor people's movements inside buildings.

Wi-Fi signals are affected by everything in the environment, including people moving or standing still, as the human body reflects and scatters radio waves.

Advanced algorithms analyze these signal changes to detect movement, determine precise locations, and even estimate the number of people in a room.

*ï¸âƒ£ Practical applications

  • An alternative to security cameras, especially in low-light conditions or obstructed views.
  • Monitoring elderly people or patients at home and sending alerts in case of falls or inactivity.
  • Smart homes that automatically control lighting and air conditioning based on room occupancy.
  • Child monitoring and restricted-area alerts.
  • Securing rooms containing sensitive documents or valuables.

*ï¸âƒ£ Challenges remain, which will be discussed in the third and final part.

ğŸ“¶ Using Waves for Tracking and Smart System Management (Part 1)

*ï¸âƒ£ What is RFID?

RFID (Radio Frequency Identification) is a method that uses radio waves to track or identify objects using tags containing a unique product code.

A reader device reads the code when it comes near the tag to identify the object or its location.

*ï¸âƒ£ Where is RFID used?

  • For example, in large warehouses without manual counting.
  • Controlling entry and exit through smart cards.
  • One of the most famous examples is reading product data automatically using devices like 'beacon' in pharmacies and stores.

*ï¸âƒ£ What are the risks?

Risks start with Wi-Fi and monitoring individuals; this topic is a bit different.

Scientists have discovered that Wi-Fi signals around us not only provide internet, but can also be used to monitor people's movements in rooms.

*ï¸âƒ£ How does it work?

Wi-Fi signals change when someone moves in the space.

Advanced devices analyze these changes and determine the person's exact location.

Not only that, it can also draw a simple shape of the person's movement based on the signals.

*ï¸âƒ£ Why are these technologies important?

  • They can be used as an alternative to security cameras since Wi-Fi can work even in low light or if there are obstacles in front of the camera.
  • Other smart uses include security, hospitals (to monitor patients), or smart buildings to know the number or characteristics of people entering or leaving.

*ï¸âƒ£ Future concerns

  • The service is very useful and currently used in security, but there are concerns like any internet-connected technology that need security solutions.
  • One of the main concerns is privacy! If these technologies fall into the wrong hands, they can be misused for spying on people in homes or offices.
  • Even worse, they could be used for intelligence espionage, blackmail, or exploitation.

*ï¸âƒ£ In the future, the technology is expected to become more accurate, allowing safer and wider use.

*ï¸âƒ£ In the end, technologies like RFID and Wi-Fi signals open new doors to use technology smartly in daily life, but we must understand how to use them to maintain privacy and safety and avoid exploitation.
